trans-unit.source: The diffusion equation is solved by minimizing x.T L x for each phase, where L is the Laplacian of the weighted graph of the image, and x is the probability that a marker of the given phase arrives first at a pixel by diffusion (x=1 on markers of the phase, x=0 on the other markers, and the other coefficients are looked for). Each pixel is attributed the label for which it has a maximal value of x. The Laplacian L of the image is defined as:
trans-unit.target: 扩散方程是通过最小化每个相位的x.T L x来求解的,其中L是图像的加权图的Laplacian,x是给定相位的标记通过扩散首先到达某个像素的概率(相位的标记上x=1,其他标记上x=0,其他的系数都要找)。每一个像素都被赋予它的标签,它的最大值为x,图像的Laplacian L定义为:。

trans-unit.source: The downloaded image was cropped to include a region of (512, 512) pixels around the top left corner, converted to grayscale, then to uint8 prior to saving the result in PNG format.

trans-unit.source: The downloaded image was then rescaled to (1024, 1024), then the top left (512, 512) pixel region was cropped prior to converting the image to grayscale and uint8 data type. The result was saved using the PNG format.

trans-unit.source: The edge magnitude depends slightly on edge directions, since the approximation of the gradient operator by the Prewitt operator is not completely rotation invariant. For a better rotation invariance, the Scharr operator should be used. The Sobel operator has a better rotation invariance than the Prewitt operator, but a worse rotation invariance than the Scharr operator.
trans-unit.target: 由于Prewitt算子对梯度算子的近似并不完全是旋转不变的,所以边缘的大小稍微取决于边缘方向。为了获得更好的旋转不变性,应该使用Scharr算子。Sobel算子的旋转不变性比Prewitt算子好,但比Scharr算子的旋转不变性差。

trans-unit.source: The eigenvalues of the Hessian matrix, in decreasing order. The eigenvalues are the leading dimension. That is, eigs[i, j, k] contains the ith-largest eigenvalue at position (j, k).
trans-unit.target: Hessian矩阵的特征值，以降序排列。特征值是主导维度。即， eigs[i, j, k] 在位置（j，k）处包含第i个最大特征值。

trans-unit.source: The eigenvalues of the inertia tensor in decreasing order.
trans-unit.target: 惯性张量的特征值依次递减。

trans-unit.source: The eigenvalues of the inertia tensor of image, in descending order.
trans-unit.target: image 惯性张量的特征值，以降序排列。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse equation:
trans-unit.target: 椭圆方程。

trans-unit.source: The end coordinates of the line.
trans-unit.target: 线的终点坐标。

trans-unit.target: 扫描线的终点。与标准numpy索引相比，目标点包含在配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: The endianness of the data in the file. By default this is the system’s native byte order.
trans-unit.target: 文件中数据的字节序。默认情况下，这是系统的本机字节顺序。

trans-unit.source: The entropy is computed using base 2 logarithm i.e. the filter returns the minimum number of bits needed to encode the local gray level distribution.
trans-unit.target: 熵使用基数2对数计算,即滤波器返回编码本地灰度分布所需的最小位数。

trans-unit.source: The entropy is computed using base 2 logarithm i.e. the filter returns the minimum number of bits needed to encode the local greylevel distribution.
trans-unit.target: 熵使用基数2对数计算,即滤波器返回编码本地灰度分布所需的最小位数。

trans-unit.source: The essential matrix is only defined for a pair of moving images capturing a non-planar scene. In the case of pure rotation or planar scenes, the homography describes the geometric relation between two images (ProjectiveTransform). If the intrinsic calibration of the images is unknown, the fundamental matrix describes the projective relation between the two images (FundamentalMatrixTransform).
trans-unit.target: 仅对于捕获非平面场景的一对运动图像定义基本矩阵。在纯旋转或平面场景的情况下，单应性描述两个图像之间的几何关系（ ProjectiveTransform ）。如果图像的固有校准未知，则基本矩阵描述两个图像之间的投影关系（ FundamentalMatrixTransform ）。

trans-unit.source: The essential matrix is only defined for a pair of moving images capturing a non-planar scene. In the case of pure rotation or planar scenes, the homography describes the geometric relation between two images (ProjectiveTransform). If the intrinsic calibration of the images is unknown, the fundamental matrix describes the projective relation between the two images (FundamentalMatrixTransform).
trans-unit.target: 仅对于捕获非平面场景的一对运动图像定义基本矩阵。在纯旋转或平面场景的情况下，单应性描述两个图像之间的几何关系（ ProjectiveTransform ）。如果图像的固有校准未知，则基本矩阵描述两个图像之间的投影关系（ FundamentalMatrixTransform ）。

trans-unit.source: The essential matrix relates corresponding points between a pair of calibrated images. The matrix transforms normalized, homogeneous image points in one image to epipolar lines in the other image.
trans-unit.target: 基本矩阵将一对校准图像之间的对应点联系起来。该矩阵将一幅图像中的归一化、同质图像点转换为另一幅图像中的外极线。

trans-unit.source: The estimated image is design as the posterior mean of a probability law (from a Bayesian analysis). The mean is defined as a sum over all the possible images weighted by their respective probability. Given the size of the problem, the exact sum is not tractable. This algorithm use of MCMC to draw image under the posterior law. The practical idea is to only draw highly probable images since they have the biggest contribution to the mean. At the opposite, the less probable images are drawn less often since their contribution is low. Finally the empirical mean of these samples give us an estimation of the mean, and an exact computation with an infinite sample set.
trans-unit.target: 估计的图像被设计为一个概率法则的后均值(来自贝叶斯分析)。平均值被定义为所有可能的图像按其各自的概率加权后的总和。考虑到问题的大小,精确的总和并不容易解决。本算法使用MCMC在后验法下绘制图像。实际的想法是只画高概率的图像,因为它们对平均值的贡献最大。反之,概率较低的图像由于其贡献率较低,所以绘制的次数较少。最后这些样本的经验平均数给我们一个平均数的估计,以及一个无限样本集的精确计算。

trans-unit.source: The estimated optical flow components for each axis.
trans-unit.target: 每个轴的估计光流分量。

trans-unit.source: The estimator is based on a least squares minimization. The optimal solution is computed directly, no iterations are required. This leads to a simple, stable and robust fitting method.
trans-unit.target: 估计器是基于最小二乘法最小化。最佳解是直接计算出来的,不需要迭代。这导致了一种简单、稳定和稳健的拟合方法。

trans-unit.source: The extent (size) of the drawn rectangle. E.g., ([num_planes,] num_rows, num_cols). Either end or extent must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 绘制矩形的范围（大小）。例如， ([num_planes,] num_rows, num_cols) 。任一 end 或 extent 必须被指定。

trans-unit.source: The extent (size) of the drawn rectangle. E.g., ([num_planes,] num_rows, num_cols). Either end or extent must be specified. A negative extent is valid, and will result in a rectangle going along the oposite direction. If extent is negative, the start point is not included.
trans-unit.target: 绘制矩形的范围（大小）。例如， ([num_planes,] num_rows, num_cols) 。任一 end 或 extent 必须被指定。负范围是有效的，并且将导致矩形沿着相反的方向行进。如果程度为负，则 start 不包含点。

trans-unit.source: The extent (size) of the inner rectangle. E.g., (num_rows, num_cols). Either end or extent must be specified. Negative extents are permitted. See rectangle to better understand how they behave.
trans-unit.target: 内部矩形的范围（大小）。例如， (num_rows, num_cols) 。任一 end 或 extent 必须被指定。允许负范围。查看 rectangle 以更好地了解它们的行为。

trans-unit.source: The forward map can be extremely big for some inputs, since its length is given by the maximum of the label field. However, in most situations, label_field.max() is much smaller than label_field.size, and in these cases the forward map is guaranteed to be smaller than either the input or output images.

trans-unit.source: The function equalize_hist() maps the cumulative distribution function (cdf) of pixel values onto a linear cdf, ensuring that all parts of the value range are equally represented in the image. As a result, details are enhanced in large regions with poor contrast. As a further refinement, histogram equalization can be performed in subregions of the image with equalize_adapthist(), in order to correct for exposure gradients across the image. See the example Histogram Equalization.
trans-unit.target: 函数 equalize_hist() 将像素值的累积分布函数（cdf ）映射到线性cdf，以确保在图像中均等地表示值范围的所有部分。结果，对比度差的大区域中的细节被增强。作为进一步的改进，可以使用 equalize_adapthist() 在图像的子区域中执行直方图均衡化，以校正整个图像的曝光梯度。参见示例直方图均衡化。

trans-unit.source: The function equalize_hist() maps the cumulative distribution function (cdf) of pixel values onto a linear cdf, ensuring that all parts of the value range are equally represented in the image. As a result, details are enhanced in large regions with poor contrast. trans-unit.source: The fundamental matrix is only defined for a pair of moving images. In the case of pure rotation or planar scenes, the homography describes the geometric relation between two images (ProjectiveTransform). If the intrinsic calibration of the images is known, the essential matrix describes the metric relation between the two images (EssentialMatrixTransform).
trans-unit.target: 基本矩阵仅针对一对运动图像定义。在纯旋转或平面场景的情况下，单应性描述两个图像之间的几何关系（ ProjectiveTransform ）。如果已知图像的固有校准，则基本矩阵描述两个图像之间的度量关系（ EssentialMatrixTransform ）。

trans-unit.source: The inertia tensor measures covariance of the image intensity along the image axes. (See inertia_tensor.) The relative magnitude of the eigenvalues of the tensor is thus a measure of the elongation of a (bright) object in the image.
trans-unit.target: 惯性张量测量图像强度沿像轴的协方差。（请参见 inertia_tensor 张量。）因此，张量的特征值的相对大小是图像中（明亮）对象的伸长率的量度。

trans-unit.target: 输入图像的惯性张量。\(T_{i,j}/)包含沿轴(i/)和轴(j)的图像强度协方差。

trans-unit.source: The input image should contain integers in [0, levels-1], where levels indicate the number of grey-levels counted (typically 256 for an 8-bit image). This argument is required for 16-bit images or higher and is typically the maximum of the image. As the output matrix is at least levels x levels, it might be preferable to use binning of the input image rather than large values for levels.
trans-unit.target: 输入图像应包含[0， levels -1]中的整数，其中级别指示所计数的灰度级数（对于8位图像，通常为256）。对于16位或更高的图像，此参数是必需的，并且通常是图像的最大值。由于输出矩阵至少为 levels x levels ，因此最好使用输入图像的分箱而非 levels 大值。

trans-unit.source: The intensity profile along the scan line. The length of the profile is the ceil of the computed length of the scan line.
trans-unit.target: 沿扫描线的强度曲线。剖面的长度是扫描线计算长度的上限。

trans-unit.source: The join J of S1 and S2 is defined as the segmentation in which two voxels are in the same segment if and only if they are in the same segment in both S1 and S2.
trans-unit.target: S1和S2的连接J的定义为，其中两个体素在相同的段分割当且仅当它们在相同的段都 S1和S2。

trans-unit.source: The join segmentation of s1 and s2.
trans-unit.target: s1和s2的加入分割。

trans-unit.source: The kernel is applied to the input image to produce separate measurements of the gradient component one orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该核应用于输入图像,以产生梯度分量一个方向的单独测量。

trans-unit.source: The keys noise and prior contain the chain list of noise and prior precision respectively.
trans-unit.target: noise 键和 prior 键分别包含噪声和先验精度的链表。

trans-unit.source: The kind of color image desired. ‘overlay’ cycles over defined colors and overlays the colored labels over the original image. ‘avg’ replaces each labeled segment with its average color, for a stained-class or pastel painting appearance.
trans-unit.target: 所需的彩色图像。“覆盖”在定义的颜色上循环，并将彩色标签覆盖在原始图像上。“ avg”用其平均颜色替换每个标记的段，以获得染色类或柔和的绘画外观。

trans-unit.source: The label 0 is assumed to denote the background and is never remapped.

trans-unit.target: 内核的线性大小为n_stds(默认为3)标准差。

trans-unit.source: The local maxima are defined as connected sets of pixels with equal gray level (plateaus) strictly greater than the gray levels of all pixels in the neighborhood.
trans-unit.target: 局部最大值被定义为具有相同灰度等级(高原)的像素的连接集,严格大于附近所有像素的灰度等级。

trans-unit.source: The local maxima are defined as connected sets of pixels with equal gray level strictly greater than the gray levels of all pixels in direct neighborhood of the set. The function labels the local maxima.
trans-unit.target: 局部最大值被定义为具有相同灰度等级的像素的连接集,其灰度等级严格大于该集合直接邻近的所有像素的灰度等级。该函数对局部最大值进行标注。

trans-unit.source: The lower algorithm complexity makes skimage.filters.rank.maximum more efficient for larger images and structuring elements.
trans-unit.target: 较低的算法复杂度使 skimage.filters.rank.maximum 对于较大的图像和结构化元素更有效。

trans-unit.source: The luminance image - an array which is the same size as the input array, but with the channel dimension removed.
trans-unit.target: 亮度图像--一个与输入数组大小相同的数组,但去掉了通道维度。

trans-unit.source: The magnitude is also computed if axis is a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果坐标轴是一个序列,也要计算幅度。

trans-unit.source: The main idea behind cascade of classifiers is to create classifiers of medium accuracy and ensemble them into one strong classifier instead of just creating a strong one. The second advantage of cascade classifier is that easy examples can be classified only by evaluating some of the classifiers in the cascade, making the process much faster than the process of evaluating a one strong classifier.
trans-unit.target: 分类器级联的主要思想是创建中等精度的分类器,并将它们合为一个强分类器,而不是只创建一个强分类器。级联分类器的第二个优点是,只需对级联中的一些分类器进行评估,就可以对容易的例子进行分类,使得这个过程比评估一个强分类器的过程要快得多。

trans-unit.source: The main idea is as follows: sharp details are identified as the difference between the original image and its blurred version. These details are added back to the original image after a scaling step:
trans-unit.target: 其主要思想如下:锐利的细节被识别为原始图像与其模糊版本之间的差异。这些细节在经过缩放步骤后又被添加回原始图像中。

trans-unit.source: The map from the new label space to the original space. This can be used to reconstruct the original label field from the relabeled one.
trans-unit.target: 从新标签空间到原始空间的映射。这可以用来从重新标记的标签字段重建原始标签字段。

trans-unit.source: The map from the new label space to the original space. This can be used to reconstruct the original label field from the relabeled one. The output data type will be the same as label_field.
trans-unit.target: 从新标签空间到原始空间的映射。这可用于从重新标记的字段中重建原始标签字段。输出数据类型将与 label_field 相同。

trans-unit.source: The map from the original label space to the returned label space. Can be used to re-apply the same mapping. See examples for usage.
trans-unit.target: 从原始标签空间到返回标签空间的映射。可用于重新应用相同的映射。使用方法请参考示例。

trans-unit.source: The map from the original label space to the returned label space. Can be used to re-apply the same mapping. See examples for usage. The output data type will be the same as relabeled.

trans-unit.source: The marching squares algorithm is a special case of the marching cubes algorithm [1]. A simple explanation is available here:
trans-unit.target: 行进平方算法是行进立方算法[1]的特例。这里有一个简单的解释：

trans-unit.source: The mask that corresponds to the input polygon.
trans-unit.target: 对应于输入的多边形的蒙版。

trans-unit.source: The maxima of height >= h. The result image is a binary image, where pixels belonging to the selected maxima take value 1, the others take value 0.
trans-unit.target: 高度的最大值> = h。结果图像是二进制图像，其中属于所选最大值的像素取值为1，其他像素取值为0。

trans-unit.source: The maxima of height >= h. The resulting image is a binary image, where pixels belonging to the selected maxima take value 1, the others take value 0.
trans-unit.target: 高度的最大值> = h。生成的图像是二进制图像，其中属于所选最大值的像素取值为1，其他像素取值为0。

trans-unit.source: The maximal extension parameter (number of pixels). The default value is 8.
trans-unit.target: 最大扩展参数(像素数)。默认值为8。

trans-unit.source: The maximum (dilation) / minimum (erosion) allowed value at each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 每个像素的最大(扩张)/最小(侵蚀)允许值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum area, in pixels, of a contiguous hole that will be filled. Replaces min_size.
trans-unit.target: 将要填充的连续孔的最大面积（以像素为单位）。替换 min_size 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum dimension of each shape to fit into the image.
trans-unit.target: 每个形状的最大尺寸,以适应图像。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of features to be returned. By default, all features are returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的最大特征数量。默认情况下,返回所有特征。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of iterations if threshold is not satisfied. 200 by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果不满足 threshold 则最大迭代次数。默认为200。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of shapes to (attempt to) fit into the shape.
trans-unit.target: (试图)装入形状的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum order of moments computed.
trans-unit.target: 计算出的最大矩阶。

trans-unit.source: The maximum possible value of an edge in the RAG. This corresponds to an edge between identical regions. This is used to put self edges in the RAG.
trans-unit.target: RAG中边缘的最大可能值。这对应于相同区域之间的边缘。这用于在RAG中放入自边。

trans-unit.source: The maximum standard deviation for Gaussian Kernel used to compute Hessian matrix. Keep this high to detect larger blobs.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算海斯矩阵的高斯核的最大标准偏差。保持此值较高,以检测较大的斑点。

trans-unit.source: The maximum standard deviation for Gaussian Kernel. Keep this high to detect larger blobs.
trans-unit.target: 高斯核的最大标准偏差。保持这个值高,可以检测到较大的斑点。

trans-unit.source: The maximum standard deviation for Gaussian kernel. Keep this high to detect larger blobs. The standard deviations of the Gaussian filter are given for each axis as a sequence, or as a single number, in which case it is equal for all axes.
trans-unit.target: 高斯核的最大标准偏差。保持这个标准差,以检测更大的斑点。高斯滤波器的标准偏差是以序列的形式给出的,或者是以单个数字给出的,在这种情况下,所有轴的标准偏差都是相等的。

trans-unit.source: The mean structural similarity index over the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的平均结构相似性指数。

trans-unit.source: The mean structural similarity over the image.
trans-unit.target: 对图像的平均结构相似度。

trans-unit.source: The mean-squared error (MSE) metric.
trans-unit.target: 均方误差(MSE)指标。

trans-unit.source: The method of [Lee94] uses an octree data structure to examine a 3x3x3 neighborhood of a pixel. The algorithm proceeds by iteratively sweeping over the image, and removing pixels at each iteration until the image stops changing. Each iteration consists of two steps: first, a list of candidates for removal is assembled; then pixels from this list are rechecked sequentially, to better preserve connectivity of the image.
trans-unit.target: [Lee94]的方法使用八叉树数据结构检查像素的3x3x3邻域。该算法以迭代方式扫过图像，并在每次迭代时都删除像素，直到图像停止更改为止。每次迭代包括两个步骤：首先，组装要删除的候选者列表；然后依次重新检查此列表中的像素，以更好地保持图像的连通性。

trans-unit.source: The method of [Lee94] uses an octree data structure to examine a 3x3x3 neighborhood of a pixel. The algorithm proceeds by iteratively sweeping over the image, and removing pixels at each iteration until the image stops changing. Each iteration consists of two steps: first, a list of candidates for removal is assembled; then pixels from this list are rechecked sequentially, to better preserve connectivity of the image.
trans-unit.target: [Lee94]的方法使用八叉树数据结构检查像素的3x3x3邻域。该算法以迭代方式扫过图像，并在每次迭代时都删除像素，直到图像停止更改为止。每次迭代包括两个步骤：首先，组装要删除的候选者列表；然后依次检查此列表中的像素，以更好地保留图像的连通性。

trans-unit.source: The method used here is that of the golden ratio introduced by T. Kohler.
trans-unit.target: 这里使用的方法是T.Kohler介绍的黄金比率的方法。

trans-unit.source: The metric to compute the distance between two descriptors. See scipy.spatial.distance.cdist for all possible types. The hamming distance should be used for binary descriptors. By default the L2-norm is used for all descriptors of dtype float or double and the Hamming distance is used for binary descriptors automatically.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个描述符之间距离的度量。有关所有可能的类型，请参见 scipy.spatial.distance.cdist 。汉明距离应用于二进制描述符。默认情况下，L2范数用于所有dtype float或double类型的描述符，汉明距离自动用于二进制描述符。

trans-unit.source: The metric to compute the distance between two descriptors. See scipy.spatial.distance.cdist for all possible types. The hamming distance should be used for binary descriptors. By default the L2-norm is used for all descriptors of dtype float or double and the Hamming distance is used for binary descriptors automatically.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个描述符之间距离的度量。有关所有可能的类型，请参见 scipy.spatial.distance.cdist 。汉明距离应用于二进制描述符。默认情况下，L2范数用于所有dtype float或double类型的描述符，汉明距离自动用于二进制描述符。

trans-unit.source: The minima of depth >= h. The result image is a binary image, where pixels belonging to the selected minima take value 1, the other pixels take value 0.
trans-unit.target: 深度的最小值> = h。结果图像是二进制图像，其中属于所选最小值的像素取值为1，其他像素取值为0。

trans-unit.source: The minima of depth >= h. The resulting image is a binary image, where pixels belonging to the selected minima take value 1, the other pixels take value 0.
trans-unit.target: 深度的最小值> = h。生成的图像是二进制图像，其中属于所选最小值的像素取值为1，其他像素取值为0。

trans-unit.source: The minimal allowed distance separating peaks.
trans-unit.target: 峰间的最小允许距离。

trans-unit.source: The minimal depth of all extracted minima.
trans-unit.target: 所有提取的最小深度。

trans-unit.source: The minimal height of all extracted maxima.
trans-unit.target: 所有提取的最大值的最小高度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum dimension of each shape to fit into the image.
trans-unit.target: 每个形状的最小尺寸,以适应图像。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of data points to fit a model to.
trans-unit.target: 拟合模型的最小数据点数量。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of iterations. 30 by default.
trans-unit.target: 最小迭代次数。默认为30次。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of shapes to (attempt to) fit into the shape.
trans-unit.target: (试图)装入形状的最小数量的形状。

trans-unit.source: The minimum standard deviation for Gaussian Kernel used to compute Hessian matrix. Keep this low to detect smaller blobs.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算海斯矩阵的高斯核的最小标准偏差。保持这个标准差,以检测较小的斑点。

trans-unit.source: The minimum standard deviation for Gaussian Kernel. Keep this low to detect smaller blobs.
trans-unit.target: 高斯核的最小标准偏差。保持较低的标准差以检测较小的斑点。

trans-unit.source: The minimum standard deviation for Gaussian kernel. Keep this low to detect smaller blobs. The standard deviations of the Gaussian filter are given for each axis as a sequence, or as a single number, in which case it is equal for all axes.
trans-unit.target: 高斯核的最小标准偏差。保持较低的标准差以检测较小的斑点。高斯滤波器的标准偏差是以序列的形式给出的,或者是以单个数字给出的,在这种情况下,所有轴的标准偏差都是相等的。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value of value of ratio (intersection area) / (small rectangle ratio) in order to merge two detections into one.
trans-unit.target: 比值的最小值(交点面积)/(小矩形比),以便将两个检测合并为一个。

trans-unit.source: The mode for finding boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 寻找边界的模式。

trans-unit.source: The mode is the value that appears most often in the local histogram.
trans-unit.target: 模式是本地直方图中最常出现的值。

trans-unit.source: The mode parameter determines how the array borders are handled, where cval is the value when mode is equal to ‘constant’. Default is ‘nearest’.
trans-unit.target: mode参数确定如何处理数组边界，其中 cval 是mode等于“ constant”时的值。默认值为“最近”。

trans-unit.source: The mode parameter determines how the array borders are handled, where cval is the value when mode is equal to ‘constant’.
trans-unit.target: mode参数确定如何处理数组边界，其中cval是mode等于“ constant”时的值。

trans-unit.source: The mode parameter determines how the array borders are handled, where cval is the value when mode is equal to ‘constant’. Default is ‘reflect’.
trans-unit.target: mode参数确定如何处理数组边界，其中cval是mode等于“ constant”时的值。默认为“反射”。

trans-unit.source: The morphological closing on an image is defined as a dilation followed by an erosion. Closing can remove small dark spots (i.e. “pepper”) and connect small bright cracks. This tends to “close” up (dark) gaps between (bright) features.
trans-unit.target: 图像上的形态学闭合定义为膨胀后腐蚀。关闭可以消除小黑点（即“胡椒”）并连接小亮点。这往往会“缩小”（亮）特征之间的（暗）间隙。

trans-unit.source: The morphological opening on an image is defined as an erosion followed by a dilation. Opening can remove small bright spots (i.e. “salt”) and connect small dark cracks. This tends to “open” up (dark) gaps between (bright) features.
trans-unit.target: 图像上的形态学开口被定义为侵蚀然后膨胀。开口可以去除小的亮点（即“盐”）并连接小的暗裂纹。这倾向于“打开”（亮）特征之间的（暗）间隙。

trans-unit.source: The most important insight in the paper is that entry time onto the queue solves two problems: a pixel should be assigned to the neighbor with the largest gradient or, if there is no gradient, pixels on a plateau should be split between markers on opposite sides.
trans-unit.target: 论文中最重要的见解是,进入队列的时间解决了两个问题:一个像素应该分配给梯度最大的邻居,或者,如果没有梯度,高原上的像素应该在对面的标记之间分割。

trans-unit.source: The multi-dimensional filter is implemented as a sequence of one-dimensional convolution filters. The intermediate arrays are stored in the same data type as the output. Therefore, for output types with a limited precision, the results may be imprecise because intermediate results may be stored with insufficient precision.
trans-unit.target: 多维滤波器是以一维卷积滤波器的序列来实现的。中间数组被存储在与输出相同的数据类型中。因此,对于精度有限的输出类型,由于中间结果的存储精度不足,结果可能不精确。

trans-unit.source: The name of the .py and .ini files must correspond. Inside the .ini file, we give the plugin meta-data:
trans-unit.target: .py 和 .ini 文件的名称必须对应。在 .ini 文件中，我们为插件提供了元数据：

trans-unit.source: The name of the illuminant (the function is NOT case sensitive).
trans-unit.target: 发光体的名称(该功能不区分大小写)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the shape to generate or None to pick random ones.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的形状名称，或者选择“ None 以选择随机形状。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood connectivity. The integer represents the maximum number of orthogonal steps to reach a neighbor. In 2D, it is 1 for a 4-neighborhood and 2 for a 8-neighborhood. Default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 邻域连通性。整数表示到达邻域的最大正交步数。在2D中,4个邻域为1,8个邻域为2。默认值为1。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as a 2-D array of 1’s and 0’s.
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的二维数组。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as a 2-D array of 1’s and 0’s. If None, a full square of size 3 is used.
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的二维数组。如果为None，则使用大小为3的完整正方形。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as a 2-D array of 1’s and 0’s. If None, use a cross-shaped structuring element (connectivity=1).
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的二维数组。如果为None，则使用十字形结构元素（连通性= 1）。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as a 2-D array of 1’s and 0’s. If None, use cross-shaped structuring element (connectivity=1).
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的二维数组。如果为None，则使用十字形结构元素（连通性= 1）。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as an array of 1’s and 0’s. If None, use cross-shaped structuring element (connectivity=1).
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的数组。如果为None，则使用十字形结构元素（连通性= 1）。

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as an n-D array of 1’s and 0’s. Default is the ball of radius 1 according to the maximum norm (i.e. a 3x3 square for 2D images, a 3x3x3 cube for 3D images, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的nD数组。默认值为根据最大范数的半径为1的球（例如，对于2D图像为3x3正方形，对于3D图像为3x3x3立方体，等等）

trans-unit.source: The neighborhood expressed as an n-D array of 1’s and 0’s. Default is the n-D square of radius equal to 1 (i.e. a 3x3 square for 2D images, a 3x3x3 cube for 3D images, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 邻域表示为1和0的nD数组。默认值为半径等于1的nD正方形（即2D图像为3x3正方形，3D图像为3x3x3立方体等）

trans-unit.source: The new combined node is adjacent to all the neighbors of src and dst. weight_func is called to decide the weight of edges incident on the new node.
trans-unit.target: 新的组合节点与 src 和 dst 的所有邻居相邻。 weight_func 决定入射在新节点上的边缘的权重。

trans-unit.source: The new labeled array.
trans-unit.target: 新的标签数组。

trans-unit.source: The new labelled array.
trans-unit.target: 新的标签数组。

trans-unit.source: The next step is to find markers of the background and the coins based on the extreme parts of the histogram of grey values:
trans-unit.target: 下一步是根据灰度值直方图的极端部分找到背景和硬币的标记。

trans-unit.source: The noise standard deviation used when computing the wavelet detail coefficient threshold(s). When None (default), the noise standard deviation is estimated via the method in [2].
trans-unit.target: 计算小波细节系数阈值时使用的噪声标准偏差。当为None（默认）时，通过[2]中的方法估计噪声标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: The noise standard deviation used when computing the wavelet detail coefficient threshold(s). When None (default), the noise standard deviation is estimated via the method in [2].
trans-unit.target: 计算小波细节系数阈值时使用的噪声标准偏差。当为None（默认）时，通过[2]中的方法估计噪声标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: The non-local means algorithm is well suited for denoising images with specific textures. The principle of the algorithm is to average the value of a given pixel with values of other pixels in a limited neighbourhood, provided that the patches centered on the other pixels are similar enough to the patch centered on the pixel of interest.
trans-unit.target: 非局部均值算法非常适合对具有特定纹理的图像进行降噪。该算法的原理是平均在有限邻域的给定像素与其它的像素的值的值，条件是该补丁集中于其它像素类似于足够到贴片上的感兴趣的像素为中心。

trans-unit.source: The normal direction at each vertex, as calculated from the data.
trans-unit.target: 根据数据计算出的每个顶点的法线方向。

trans-unit.source: The number of histogram bins. Will default to image.max() + 1 if None is passed.
trans-unit.target: 直方图箱数。如果未传递任何参数，则默认为 image.max() + 1 。

trans-unit.source: The number of intermediate values of standard deviations to consider between min_sigma and max_sigma.
trans-unit.target: min_sigma 和 max_sigma 之间要考虑的标准偏差的中间值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of parallel threads to use during cycle spinning. If set to None, the full set of available cores are used.
trans-unit.target: 循环旋转期间使用的并行线程数。如果设置为 None ，则使用完整的可用核心集。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels in the right, left and bottom end of the image to be excluded from being considered for a seam. This is important as certain filters just ignore image boundaries and set them to 0. By default border is set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 图像的左右，左端和底端的像素数要考虑排除在接缝之外。这很重要，因为某些滤镜只会忽略图像边界并将其设置为 0 。默认情况下，border设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels is defined as the number of pixels which are included in the structuring element and the mask.
trans-unit.target: 像素数定义为包含在结构元素和掩模中的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels is defined as the number of pixels which are included in the structuring element and the mask. Additionally pixels must have a greylevel inside the interval [g-s0, g+s1] where g is the greyvalue of the center pixel.
trans-unit.target: 像素的数量是指结构元素和掩模中包含的像素数量。此外,像素的灰度等级必须在[g-s0,g+s1]范围内,其中g是中心像素的灰度值。

trans-unit.source: The number of produced segments as well as their size can only be controlled indirectly through scale. Segment size within an image can vary greatly depending on local contrast.
trans-unit.target: 生产段的数量及其大小只能通过 scale 间接控制。图像中的片段大小可能会因局部对比度而有很大差异。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows and columns of the image to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成图像的行数和列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of sample to ignore to start computation of the mean. 15 by default.
trans-unit.target: 开始计算平均数时要忽略的样本数。默认为15。

trans-unit.source: The number of spatial dimensions of image. If ambiguous, the value is None.
trans-unit.target: image 的空间维数。如果不明确，则值为 None 。

trans-unit.source: The number of wavelet decomposition levels to use. The default is three less than the maximum number of possible decomposition levels.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的小波分解级别数。默认值是比最大分解级别数少3个。

trans-unit.source: The number or N-cuts to perform before determining the optimal one.
trans-unit.target: 在确定最佳方案之前,要进行多少次或N次切割。

trans-unit.source: The optimal J-invariant version of denoise_function.
trans-unit.target: denoise_function 的最佳J不变形式。

trans-unit.source: The order of interpolation. The order has to be in the range 0-5:
trans-unit.target: 内插的顺序。顺序必须在0-5的范围内。

trans-unit.source: The order of the contours in the output list is determined by the position of the smallest x,y (in lexicographical order) coordinate in the contour. This is a side-effect of how the input array is traversed, but can be relied upon.
trans-unit.target: 轮廓在输出列表中的顺序由轮廓中最小 x,y （按字典顺序）坐标的位置确定。这是遍历输入数组的方式的副作用，但可以依靠它。

trans-unit.source: The order of the spline interpolation to compute image values at non-integer coordinates. 0 means nearest-neighbor interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 在非整数坐标上计算图像值的花键插值顺序。0表示最近邻插值。

trans-unit.source: The order of the spline interpolation, default is 0 if image.dtype is bool and 1 otherwise. The order has to be in the range 0-5. See skimage.transform.warp for detail.
trans-unit.target: 样条插值的顺序，如果image.dtype为bool，则默认为0，否则为1。顺序必须在0-5范围内。有关详细信息，请参见 skimage.transform.warp 。

trans-unit.source: The order of the spline interpolation, default is 0 if image.dtype is bool and 1 otherwise. The order has to be in the range 0-5. See skimage.transform.warp for detail.
trans-unit.target: 样条插值的顺序，如果image.dtype为bool，则默认为0，否则为1。顺序必须在0-5范围内。有关详细信息，请参见 skimage.transform.warp 。

trans-unit.source: The order of the spline interpolation, default is 1. The order has to be in the range 0-5. See skimage.transform.warp for detail.
trans-unit.target: 样条插值的顺序，默认为1。顺序必须在0-5的范围内。有关详细信息，请参见 skimage.transform.warp 。

trans-unit.source: The ordered pixel indices (referring to the ravelled array). The pixels are ordered such that every pixel is preceded by its parent (except for the root which has no parent).
trans-unit.target: 有序的像素指数(指的是ravelled数组)。象素的排序方式是每个象素的前面都有一个父象素(除了没有父象素的根象素)。

trans-unit.source: The orientation of corners is computed using the first order central moment i.e. the center of mass approach. The corner orientation is the angle of the vector from the corner coordinate to the intensity centroid in the local neighborhood around the corner calculated using first order central moment.
trans-unit.target: 角的方向是用一阶中心矩即质心法计算的。角的方向是用一阶中心矩计算的角坐标到角周围局部邻域强度中心点的矢量角。

trans-unit.source: The origin is the top left corner of the original image. X and Y axis are horizontal and vertical edges respectively. The distance is the minimal algebraic distance from the origin to the detected line. The angle accuracy can be improved by decreasing the step size in the theta array.
trans-unit.target: 原点是原始图像的左上角。X和Y轴分别是水平和垂直边缘。该距离是从原点到检测线的最小代数距离。可以通过减小 theta 阵列中的步长来提高角度精度。

trans-unit.target: 原始图像是从CC0Textures下载的，并根据知识共享CC0许可获得许可。

trans-unit.source: The original image was downloaded from CC0Textures and licensed under the Creative Commons CC0 License.

trans-unit.source: The original resolution images, images with different exposure and lighting, and ground-truth depth maps can be found at the Middlebury website [2].
trans-unit.target: 原始分辨率的图像，具有不同曝光和照明的图像以及真实的深度图可以在Middlebury网站上找到[2]。

trans-unit.source: The original resolution images, images with different exposure and lighting, and ground-truth depth maps can be found at the Middlebury website [2].
trans-unit.target: 原始分辨率图像，具有不同曝光和光照的图像以及真实深度图可在Middlebury网站上找到[2]。

trans-unit.source: The output array. Will be created if not provided. It should have the same dtype as output_vals.
trans-unit.target: 输出数组。如果未提供，将被创建。它应具有与 output_vals 相同的dtype。

trans-unit.source: The output is a triangular mesh consisting of a set of unique vertices and connecting triangles. The order of these vertices and triangles in the output list is determined by the position of the smallest x,y,z (in lexicographical order) coordinate in the contour. This is a side-effect of how the input array is traversed, but can be relied upon.
trans-unit.target: 输出是一个三角形网格，由一组唯一的顶点和连接的三角形组成。这些顶点和三角形在输出列表中的顺序由轮廓中最小 x,y,z （按字典顺序）坐标的位置确定。这是遍历输入数组的方式的副作用，但可以依靠它。

trans-unit.source: The output is an array with values between -1.0 and 1.0. The value at a given position corresponds to the correlation coefficient between the image and the template.
trans-unit.target: 输出是一个数组,数值在-1.0和1.0之间。给定位置的值对应于图像和模板之间的相关系数。

trans-unit.source: The output of func(x, **func_kw) averaged over all combinations of the specified axis shifts.
trans-unit.target: func(x, **func_kw) 的输出在指定轴移位的所有组合上平均。

trans-unit.source: The output type of a function is determined by the function author and is documented for the benefit of the user. While this requires the user to explicitly convert the output to whichever format is needed, it ensures that no unnecessary data copies take place.
trans-unit.target: 函数的输出类型是由函数作者决定的,并且为了用户的利益而被记录下来。虽然这需要用户明确地将输出转换为任何需要的格式,但它确保不会发生不必要的数据拷贝。

trans-unit.source: The overall amount of different features used by cascade. Two stumps can use the same features but has different trained values.
trans-unit.target: 级联使用的不同特征的总体数量。两个树桩可以使用相同的特征,但具有不同的训练值。

trans-unit.source: The overall amount of stumps in all the stages of cascade.
trans-unit.target: 各个阶段串联的总体数量。

trans-unit.source: The overlay currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当前显示的覆盖层。

trans-unit.source: The p-norm to apply for metric='minkowski'.
trans-unit.target: 申请 metric='minkowski' 的p范数。

trans-unit.source: The padding function, if used, should return a rank 1 array equal in length to the vector argument with padded values replaced. It has the following signature:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用padding函数,应该返回一个与向量参数长度相等的等级为1的数组,并替换填充值。它的签名如下:

trans-unit.source: The path to the picture.
trans-unit.target: 画面的路径。

trans-unit.source: The peak local maximum function returns the coordinates of local peaks (maxima) in an image. A maximum filter is used for finding local maxima. This operation dilates the original image. After comparison of the dilated and original image, this function returns the coordinates or a mask of the peaks where the dilated image equals the original image.
trans-unit.target: 峰值局部最大值函数返回图像中局部峰值(最大值)的坐标。最大滤波器用于寻找局部最大值。此操作对原始图像进行稀释。对稀释后的图像和原始图像进行比较后,该函数返回稀释后的图像等于原始图像的峰的坐标或掩码。

trans-unit.source: The peaks with a maximal extension of 2 or less are removed. The remaining peaks have all a maximal extension of at least 3.
trans-unit.target: 最大延伸率为2或更少的峰被移除。其余的峰的最大延伸率都至少为3。

trans-unit.source: The peaks with a surface smaller than 8 are removed.
trans-unit.target: 表面小于8的峰被去除。

trans-unit.source: The plugin will automatically delegate parameters to image_filter based on its parameter type, i.e., ptype (widgets for required arguments must be added in the order they appear in the function). The image attached to the viewer is automatically passed as the first argument to the filter function.
trans-unit.target: 插件将根据其参数类型（即 ptype )自动将参数委派给 image_filter （必须按其在函数中出现的顺序添加必需参数的小部件）。附加到查看器的图像将作为第一个参数自动传递到过滤器函数。

trans-unit.source: The point in image used as the starting point for the flood fill. If the image is 1D, this point may be given as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 在该点 image 作为颜色填充的起点。如果图像是1D，则此点可以作为整数给出。

trans-unit.source: The point spread function.
trans-unit.target: 点差函数。

trans-unit.source: The polar or log-polar warped image.
trans-unit.target: 极性或对数极性扭曲的图像。

trans-unit.source: The polygon coordinates of shape (N, 2) where N is the number of points.
trans-unit.target: 形状(N,2)的多边形坐标,其中N为点的数量。

trans-unit.source: The positions ((x1, y1), (x2, y2)) of the line ends.
The pre-computed central moments of image.
trans-unit.target: 预先计算的中心矩 image 。

trans-unit.source: The pre-computed central moments of image. The inertia tensor computation requires the central moments of the image. If an application requires both the central moments and the inertia tensor (for example, skimage.measure.regionprops), then it is more efficient to pre-compute them and pass them to the inertia tensor call.
trans-unit.target: 预先计算的中心矩 image 。惯性张量计算需要图像的中心矩。如果应用程序同时需要中心矩和惯性张量（例如 skimage.measure.regionprops ），则预先计算它们并将它们传递给惯性张量调用会更有效。

trans-unit.source: The pre-computed inertia tensor. If T is given, mu and image are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 预先计算的惯性张量。如果给定 T ，则忽略 mu 和 image 。

trans-unit.source: The presented code implements the HOG extraction method from [2] with the following changes: (I) blocks of (3, 3) cells are used ((2, 2) in the paper; (II) no smoothing within cells (Gaussian spatial window with sigma=8pix in the paper); (III) L1 block normalization is used (L2-Hys in the paper).
trans-unit.target: 所呈现的代码实现了[2]中 HOG提取方法的以下更改：（I）使用了（3，3）个像元的块（本文中（（2，2））；（II）像元内没有平滑（高斯空间）窗口中sigma = 8pix）（III）使用L1块归一化（本文中L2-Hys）。

trans-unit.source: The presented code implements the HOG extraction method from [2] with the following changes: (I) blocks of (3, 3) cells are used ((2, 2) in the paper); (II) no smoothing within cells (Gaussian spatial window with sigma=8pix in the paper); (III) L1 block normalization is used (L2-Hys in the paper).
trans-unit.target: 所呈现的代码通过以下更改实现了[2]中的HOG提取方法：（I）使用了（3，3）个单元的块（本文中为（2，2））；（II）单元内无平滑（本文中sigma = 8pix的高斯空间窗）；（III）使用L1块归一化（本文中为L2-Hys）。

trans-unit.source: The principle of total variation denoising is explained in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_variation_denoising
trans-unit.target: 总变异降噪的原理在http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_variation_denoising中进行了解释

trans-unit.source: The principle of total variation denoising is explained in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_variation_denoising
trans-unit.target: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_variation_denoising中解释了总变异去噪的原理

trans-unit.source: The principle of total variation denoising is to minimize the total variation of the image, which can be roughly described as the integral of the norm of the image gradient. Total variation denoising tends to produce “cartoon-like” images, that is, piecewise-constant images.
trans-unit.target: 总变化去噪的原理是使图像的总变化最小，这可以粗略地描述为图像梯度范数的积分。总变异去噪趋于产生“卡通状”图像，即分段恒定图像。

trans-unit.source: The property of the GLCM to compute. The default is ‘contrast’.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的GLCM的属性。默认值为“对比”。

trans-unit.source: The radius of each blob is approximately sigma. Computation of Determinant of Hessians is independent of the standard deviation. Therefore detecting larger blobs won’t take more time. In methods line blob_dog() and blob_log() the computation of Gaussians for larger sigma takes more time. The downside is that this method can’t be used for detecting blobs of radius less than 3px due to the box filters used in the approximation of Hessian Determinant.
trans-unit.target: 每个斑点的半径大约为 sigma 。黑森州行列式的计算与标准偏差无关。因此，检测更大的斑点不会花费更多时间。在方法 blob_dog() 和 blob_log() 中，对较大的 sigma 进行高斯计算需要花费更多时间。缺点是，由于在近似于黑森州行列式中使用了箱形滤波器，因此该方法不能用于检测半径小于 3px 的斑点。

trans-unit.source: The radius of each blob is approximately \(\sqrt{2}\sigma\) for a 2-D image and \(\sqrt{3}\sigma\) for a 3-D image.
trans-unit.target: 对于二维图像来说,每个小球的半径大约是(sqrt{2},对于三维图像来说,大约是(sqrt{3})。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the ball-shaped structuring element.
trans-unit.target: 球形结构件的半径。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the diamond-shaped structuring element.
trans-unit.target: 菱形结构件的半径。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the disk-shaped structuring element.
trans-unit.target: 盘形结构元素的半径。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the octahedron-shaped structuring element.
trans-unit.target: 八面体形结构元素的半径。

trans-unit.source: The range of a floating point image is [0.0, 1.0] or [-1.0, 1.0] when converting from unsigned or signed datatypes, respectively. If the input image has a float type, intensity values are not modified and can be outside the ranges [0.0, 1.0] or [-1.0, 1.0].
trans-unit.target: 当从无符号或有符号数据类型转换时,浮点图像的范围分别是[0.0,1.0]或[-1.0,1.0]。如果输入图像是浮点类型,强度值不会被修改,可以在[0.0,1.0]或[-1.0,1.0]范围之外。

trans-unit.source: The range of sigmas used.
trans-unit.target: 使用的sigmas范围。

trans-unit.source: The range of values to sample pixel values from. For grayscale images the format is (min, max). For multichannel - ((min, max),) if the ranges are equal across the channels, and ((min_0, max_0), … (min_N, max_N)) if they differ. As the function supports generation of uint8 arrays only, the maximum range is (0, 255). If None, set to (0, 254) for each channel reserving color of intensity = 255 for background.
trans-unit.target: 从中采样像素值的值范围。对于灰度图像，格式为（最小，最大）。对于多通道-（（min，max），）如果通道之间的范围相等，则（（min_0，max_0），…（min_N，max_N））不同。由于该函数仅支持生成uint8数组，因此最大范围为（0，255）。如果为无，则为每个通道设置为（0，254），保留背景的强度= 255的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The ratio between the standard deviation of Gaussian Kernels used for computing the Difference of Gaussians
trans-unit.target: 用于计算高斯差的高斯核的标准差之间的比率。

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which the search step in multiplied on each scale of the image. 1 represents the exaustive search and usually is slow. By setting this parameter to higher values the results will be worse but the computation will be much faster. Usually, values in the interval [1, 1.5] give good results.
trans-unit.target: 在图像的每个比例上,搜索步骤乘以的比率。1代表严格的搜索,通常很慢。将此参数设置为更高的值,结果会更差,但计算速度会快很多。通常,在[1,1.5]范围内的值会得到好的结果。

trans-unit.source: The real and imaginary parts of the Gabor filter kernel are applied to the image and the response is returned as a pair of arrays.
trans-unit.target: Gabor滤波核的实部和虚部被应用到图像上,并以一对数组的形式返回响应。

trans-unit.source: The reconstructed image (or curve, in this case) is exactly the same as the mask image, except that the peaks are truncated to 0.5 and 0. The middle peak disappears completely: Since there were no seed values in this peak region, its reconstructed value is truncated to the surrounding value (-1).
trans-unit.target: 重构后的图像(或曲线,在这种情况下)与掩模图像完全相同,只是峰值被截断为0.5和0,中间的峰值完全消失。因为在这个峰值区域没有种子值,它的重建值被截断为周围的值(-1)。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is drawn with rectprops; default:
trans-unit.target: 用rectprops绘制矩形; 默认：

trans-unit.source: The red component of the pixel (0-255).
trans-unit.target: 像素的红色分量(0-255)。

trans-unit.source: The region adjacency graph.
trans-unit.target: 区域相邻图。

trans-unit.source: The region of an integral image for which the features need to be computed.
trans-unit.target: 积分图像中需要计算特征的区域。

trans-unit.source: The regularisation operator. The Laplacian by default. It can be an impulse response or a transfer function, as for the psf.
trans-unit.target: 正则化运算符。缺省的拉普拉斯系数。它可以是一个脉冲响应或传递函数,如psf。

trans-unit.source: The regularisation operator. The Laplacian by default. It can be an impulse response or a transfer function, as for the psf. Shape constraint is the same as for the psf parameter.
trans-unit.target: 正则化运算符。默认情况下为拉普拉斯语。对于psf，它可以是冲激响应或传递函数。形状约束与 psf 参数相同。

trans-unit.source: The regularisation parameter value that tunes the balance between the data adequacy that improve frequency restoration and the prior adequacy that reduce frequency restoration (to avoid noise artifacts).
trans-unit.target: 正则化参数值,用于调整改善频率恢复的数据充分性和减少频率恢复的预先充分性(以避免噪声伪影)之间的平衡。

trans-unit.source: The result of blending a cycling colormap (colors) for each distinct value in label with the image, at a certain alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 将 label 每个不同值的循环颜色图（ colors ）与图像以某个alpha值混合的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of morphological reconstruction.
trans-unit.target: 形态重建的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the local enhance_contrast.
trans-unit.target: 本地增强对比度的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological black top hat.
trans-unit.target: 形态上黑顶帽的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological closing.
trans-unit.target: 形态关闭的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological dilation with values in [False, True].
trans-unit.target: 用 [False, True] 值进行形态学扩张的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological dilation.
trans-unit.target: 形态扩张的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological erosion taking values in [False, True].
trans-unit.target: 形态侵蚀的结果取 [False, True] 。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological erosion.
trans-unit.target: 形态侵蚀的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological opening.
trans-unit.target: 形态开放的结果。

trans-unit.source: The result of the morphological white top hat.
trans-unit.target: 形态上白顶帽的结果。

trans-unit.source: The resulting binary mask is True if the gray value of the center pixel is greater than the local mean.
trans-unit.target: 如果中心像素的灰度值大于局部平均值,则产生的二进制掩码为True。

trans-unit.source: The resulting binary mask is True if the greyvalue of the center pixel is greater than the local mean.
trans-unit.target: 如果中心像素的灰度值大于局部平均值,则产生的二进制掩码为True。

trans-unit.source: The resulting dictionary can be directly passed to pandas, if installed, to obtain a clean DataFrame:
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了pandas,可以直接将生成的字典传递给pandas,以获得一个干净的DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image contains the labeled local maxima.
trans-unit.target: 由此产生的图像包含标注的局部最大值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image will contain 3 local maxima.
trans-unit.target: 结果图像将包含3个局部最大值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image will contain 3 local minima.
trans-unit.target: 结果图像将包含3个局部最小值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image will contain 4 local maxima.
trans-unit.target: 结果图像将包含4个局部最大值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image will contain 4 local minima.
trans-unit.target: 结果图像将包含4个局部最小值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image will contain all 6 local maxima.
trans-unit.target: 结果图像将包含所有6个局部最大值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting image will contain all 6 local minima.
trans-unit.target: 结果图像将包含所有6个局部最小值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting reconstructed image looks exactly like the original image, but with the peaks of the bumps cut off. Subtracting this reconstructed image from the original image leaves just the peaks of the bumps
trans-unit.target: 重构后的图像看起来和原始图像一模一样,但凸起的山峰被切掉了。从原始图像中减去重建的图像,只留下疙瘩的峰顶。

trans-unit.source: The return labels will start at offset, which should be strictly positive.
trans-unit.target: 返回标签将从 offset 开始，该位置应严格为正。

trans-unit.source: The returned function is partially evaluated with optimal parameter values set for denoising the input image.
trans-unit.target: 返回的函数经过部分评估,设置最佳参数值,用于对输入图像进行去噪。

trans-unit.source: The returned generator yields indices into theta such that theta[indices] gives the approximate golden ratio ordering of the projections. In total, len(theta) indices are yielded. All non-negative integers < len(theta) are yielded exactly once.
trans-unit.target: 返回的生成器将索引产生到 theta 中，以使 theta[indices] 给出投影的近似黄金分割率顺序。总共得出 len(theta) 指数。所有< len(theta) 的非负整数仅产生一次。

trans-unit.source: The returned points (as slices) should be as close to cubically-spaced as possible. Essentially, the points are spaced by the Nth root of the input array size, where N is the number of dimensions. However, if an array dimension cannot fit a full step size, it is “discarded”, and the computation is done for only the remaining dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 返回的点（作为切片）应尽可能接近立方间隔。本质上，这些点之间的距离为输入数组大小的第N个根，其中N为维数。但是，如果数组维数不能适合完整的步长，则将其“丢弃”，并且仅对其余维数进行计算。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is measured in bits or shannon (Sh) for base=2, natural unit (nat) for base=np.e and hartley (Hart) for base=10.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值以比特或shannon(Sh)为基数=2,自然单位(nat)为基数=np.e,哈特利(Hartley)为基数=10。

trans-unit.source: The reverse can be achieved with img_as_ubyte():
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 img_as_ubyte() 实现相反的操作：

trans-unit.source: The rotation center. If center=None, the image is rotated around its center, i.e. center=(cols / 2 - 0.5, rows / 2 - 0.5). Please note that this parameter is (cols, rows), contrary to normal skimage ordering.
trans-unit.target: 旋转中心。如果 center=None ，则图像绕其中心旋转，即 center=(cols / 2 - 0.5, rows / 2 - 0.5) 。请注意，此参数为（cols，rows），这与普通的skimage排序相反。

trans-unit.source: The scale by which searching window is multiplied on each step.
trans-unit.target: 每一步搜索窗口乘以的比例。

trans-unit.source: The scale factors kL, kC set the weight given to differences in lightness and chroma relative to differences in hue. The usual values are kL=2, kC=1 for “acceptability” and kL=1, kC=1 for “imperceptibility”. Colors with dE > 1 are “different” for the given scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 比例因子 kL ， kC 设置相对于色调差异的亮度和色度差异的权重。对于“可接受性”，通常的值为 kL=2 ， kC=1 ,对于“不可接受性”，通常值为 kL=1 ， kC=1 。对于给定的比例因子， dE > 1 颜色“不同”。

trans-unit.source: The scikit-image mailing-list is scikit-image@python.org (users should join before posting). This mailing-list is shared by users and developers, and it is the right place to ask any question about skimage, or in general, image processing using Python. Posting snippets of code with minimal examples ensures to get more relevant and focused answers.

If the tile depth is provided, the SGI image_depth and tile_depth tags are used to save volume data. Few software can read the SGI format, e.g. MeVisLab.

trans-unit.source: The sigma values of the spatial Gaussian smoothing in this code do not match the sigma values in the original code by Tola et al. [2]. In their code, spatial smoothing is applied to both the input image and the center histogram. However, this smoothing is not documented in [1] and, therefore, it is omitted.
trans-unit.target: 该代码中空间高斯平滑的sigma值与Tola等人在原始代码中的sigma值不匹配。[2]。在他们的代码中，将空间平滑应用于输入图像和中心直方图。但是，此平滑未在[1]中进行记录，因此将其省略。

trans-unit.source: The two images are part of the Middlebury 2014 stereo benchmark. The dataset was created by Nera Nesic, Porter Westling, Xi Wang, York Kitajima, Greg Krathwohl, and Daniel Scharstein at Middlebury College. A detailed description of the acquisition process can be found in [1].

trans-unit.source: The two images are part of the Middlebury 2014 stereo benchmark. The dataset was created by Nera Nesic, Porter Westling, Xi Wang, York Kitajima, Greg Krathwohl, and Daniel Scharstein at Middlebury College. A detailed description of the acquisition process can be found in [1].
trans-unit.target: 这两个图像是Middlebury 2014立体声基准测试的一部分。数据集由米德尔伯里学院的Nera Nesic，Porter Westling，Xi Wang，York Kitajima，Greg Krathwohl和Daniel Scharstein创建。采集过程的详细描述可以在[1]中找到。

trans-unit.source: The two images are rectified such that every pixel in the left image has its corresponding pixel on the same scanline in the right image. That means that both images are warped such that they have the same orientation but a horizontal spatial offset (baseline). The ground-truth pixel offset in column direction is specified by the included disparity map.
trans-unit.target: 这两幅图像经过校正后,左边图像中的每一个像素在右边图像的同一扫描线上都有相应的像素。这意味着两幅图像都被扭曲,使它们具有相同的方向,但有一个水平空间偏移(基线)。柱方向的地真像素偏移量由包含的差异图指定。

trans-unit.source: The two-dimensional FRT
trans-unit.target: 二维FRT

trans-unit.source: The two-dimensional inverse FRT.
trans-unit.target: 二维逆向FRT。

trans-unit.target: 要考虑的特征类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of wavelet to perform and can be any of the options pywt.wavelist outputs. The default is ‘db1’. For example, wavelet can be any of {'db2', 'haar', 'sym9'} and many more.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的w​​avelet的类型，可以是 pywt.wavelist 输出的任何选项。缺省值为 ‘db1’ 。例如， wavelet 可以是 {'db2', 'haar', 'sym9'} 等中的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: The type of window to be created. Any window type supported by scipy.signal.get_window is allowed here. See notes below for a current list, or the SciPy documentation for the version of SciPy on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的窗口的类型。此处允许 scipy.signal.get_window 支持的任何窗口类型。有关当前列表，请参见下面的注释，或有关计算机上SciPy版本的SciPy文档。

trans-unit.source: The unreduced array will be returned when reduce_func is None or when reduce_func acts on each pixel value individually.
trans-unit.target: 当 reduce_func 为None或 reduce_func 分别作用于每个像素值时，将返回未缩减的数组。

trans-unit.source: The upper half of the input dtype’s positive range is True, and the lower half is False. All negative values (if present) are False.
trans-unit.target: 输入dtype的正范围的上半部分为True，下半部分为False。所有负值（如果存在）均为False。

trans-unit.source: The upper-diagonal elements of the Hessian matrix, as returned by hessian_matrix.
trans-unit.target: 由 hessian_matrix 返回的Hessian矩阵的上对角线元素。

trans-unit.target: 黑森州矩阵的上对角线元素，由 hessian_matrix 返回。

trans-unit.source: The value of each pixel is the index of its parent in the ravelled array.
trans-unit.target: 每个像素的值是其父代在ravelled数组中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The values are scaled between -32768 and 32767. If the input data-type is positive-only (e.g., uint8), then the output image will still only have positive values.
trans-unit.target: 这些值在-32768和32767之间缩放。如果输入的数据类型只有正值(例如,uint8),那么输出的图像仍然只有正值。

trans-unit.source: The values at the center of the bins.
trans-unit.target: 仓中心的数值。

trans-unit.source: The values of the histogram.
trans-unit.target: 直方图的数值。

trans-unit.source: The values should be in the range [-pi, pi). If a masked array is provided, the masked entries will not be changed, and their values will not be used to guide the unwrapping of neighboring, unmasked values. Masked 1D arrays are not allowed, and will raise a ValueError.
trans-unit.target: 值应在[-pi，pi）范围内。如果提供了带掩码的数组，则将不会更改带掩码的条目，并且它们的值也不会用于指导对相邻的，未带掩码的值的展开。不允许使用屏蔽的1D数组，它会引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: The values to map from.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的值。

trans-unit.source: The values to map to.
trans-unit.target: 要映射到的值。

trans-unit.source: The variation of information is defined as VI(X,Y) = H(X|Y) + H(Y|X). If X is the ground-truth segmentation, then H(X|Y) can be interpreted as the amount of under-segmentation and H(X|Y) as the amount of over-segmentation. In other words, a perfect over-segmentation will have H(X|Y)=0 and a perfect under-segmentation will have H(Y|X)=0.
trans-unit.target: 信息的变化定义为VI(X,Y)=H(X|Y)+H(Y|X)。如果X是地真分割,那么H(X|Y)可以理解为欠分割的量,H(X|Y)可以理解为过分割的量。换句话说,一个完美的过度分割将有H(X|Y)=0,一个完美的不足分割将有H(Y|X)=0。

trans-unit.source: The viewer’s show() method returns a list of tuples, one for each attached plugin. Each tuple contains two elements: an overlay of the same shape as the input image, and a data field (which may be None). A plugin class documents its return value in its output method.
trans-unit.target: 查看者的 show() 方法返回一个元组列表，每个附加的插件一个。每个元组包含两个元素：与输入图像形状相同的叠加层，以及一个数据字段（可以为 None ）。插件类在其 output 方法中记录其返回值。

trans-unit.source: The voxel spacing along each image dimension. By default, slic assumes uniform spacing (same voxel resolution along z, y and x). This parameter controls the weights of the distances along z, y, and x during k-means clustering.
trans-unit.target: 沿每个图像尺寸的体素间距。默认情况下， slic 假定间距均匀（沿z，y和x的体素分辨率相同）。此参数控制在k均值聚类期间沿z，y和x的距离的权重。

trans-unit.source: The voxel spacing along each image dimension. By default, slic assumes uniform spacing (same voxel resolution along z, y and x). This parameter controls the weights of the distances along z, y, and x during k-means clustering.
trans-unit.target: 沿每个图像尺寸的体素间距。默认情况下， slic 假定间距均匀（沿z，y和x的体素分辨率相同）。此参数控制在k均值聚类期间沿z，y和x的距离的权重。

trans-unit.source: The warped input image.
trans-unit.target: 弯曲的输入图像。

trans-unit.source: The watershed algorithm is useful to separate overlapping objects.
trans-unit.target: 分水岭算法对分离重叠的对象很有用。

trans-unit.source: The wavelet domain is a sparse representation of the image, and can be thought of similarly to the frequency domain of the Fourier transform. Sparse representations have most values zero or near-zero and truly random noise is (usually) represented by many small values in the wavelet domain. Setting all values below some threshold to 0 reduces the noise in the image, but larger thresholds also decrease the detail present in the image.
trans-unit.target: 小波域是图像的一种稀疏表示,可以认为类似于傅里叶变换的频域。稀疏表示的大部分值为零或接近零,真正的随机噪声在小波域中(通常)由许多小值表示。将所有低于某个阈值的值都设置为0,可以降低图像中的噪声,但较大的阈值也会降低图像中存在的细节。

trans-unit.source: The weight w_ij is a decreasing function of the norm of the local gradient. This ensures that diffusion is easier between pixels of similar values.
trans-unit.target: 权重w_ij是局部梯度法线的递减函数。这保证了相似值的像素之间更容易扩散。

trans-unit.source: The weights used in this conversion are calibrated for contemporary CRT phosphors:
trans-unit.target: 此转换中使用的砝码是针对当代CRT荧光粉进行校准的。

trans-unit.source: The white top hat of an image is defined as the image minus its morphological opening. This operation returns the bright spots of the image that are smaller than the structuring element.
trans-unit.target: 图像的白色顶帽定义为图像减去其形态开口。该操作返回图像中比结构元素小的亮点。

trans-unit.source: The width and height of the square.
trans-unit.target: 正方形的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: The width of a detection window that is used. Objects smaller than this window can’t be detected.
trans-unit.target: 使用的检测窗口的宽度。无法检测到小于此窗口的对象。

trans-unit.source: The width of the border examined. By default, only objects that touch the outside of the image are removed.
trans-unit.target: 检查边界的宽度。默认情况下,只有接触到图像外部的物体才会被移除。

trans-unit.source: The width of the picture.
trans-unit.target: 画面的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width, height and depth of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 立方体的宽度、高度和深度。

trans-unit.source: Then, we create a seed image initialized to the minimum mask value (for reconstruction by dilation, min-intensity values don’t spread) and add “seeds” to the left and right peak, but at a fraction of peak value (1).
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们创建一个初始化为最小蒙版值的种子图像（用于通过膨胀进行重建，最小强度值不会散布），并在左右峰值之间添加“种子”，但以峰值的一小部分为准（1） 。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of different options to define this map, depending on the dimensionality of the input image. A 2-D image can have 2 dimensions for gray-scale images, or 3 dimensions with color information.

trans-unit.source: There is a single ambiguous case in the marching squares algorithm: when a given 2 x 2-element square has two high-valued and two low-valued elements, each pair diagonally adjacent. (Where high- and low-valued is with respect to the contour value sought.) In this case, either the high-valued elements can be ‘connected together’ via a thin isthmus that separates the low-valued elements, or vice-versa. When elements are connected together across a diagonal, they are considered ‘fully connected’ (also known as ‘face+vertex-connected’ or ‘8-connected’). Only high-valued or low-valued elements can be fully-connected, the other set will be considered as ‘face-connected’ or ‘4-connected’. By default, low-valued elements are considered fully-connected; this can be altered with the ‘fully_connected’ parameter.
trans-unit.target: 行进平方算法中只有一个模棱两可的情况：当给定的 2 x 2 元素平方具有两个高值元素和两个低值元素时，每个对角相邻。 （高值和低值相对于所求出的轮廓值。）在这种情况下，可以通过分隔低值元素的细峡峡将高值元素“连接在一起”，反之亦然。当元素通过对角线连接在一起时，它们被认为是“完全连接”（也称为“ face + vertex-connected”或“ 8-connected”）。只能将高值或低值元素完全连接，另一组将被视为“面连接”或“ 4连接”。默认情况下，低值元素被视为完全连接；可以使用'fully_connected'参数进行更改。

trans-unit.source: These methods are then specific to a prior model. Consequently, the application or the true image nature must corresponds to the prior model. By default, the prior model (Laplacian) introduce image smoothness or pixel correlation. It can also be interpreted as high-frequency penalization to compensate the instability of the solution with respect to the data (sometimes called noise amplification or “explosive” solution).

trans-unit.source: Thin potential edges to 1-pixel wide curves. First, find the normal to the edge at each point. This is done by looking at the signs and the relative magnitude of the X-Sobel and Y-Sobel to sort the points into 4 categories: horizontal, vertical, diagonal and antidiagonal. Then look in the normal and reverse directions to see if the values in either of those directions are greater than the point in question. Use interpolation to get a mix of points instead of picking the one that’s the closest to the normal.
trans-unit.target: 细小的潜在边缘到1像素宽的曲线。首先，找到每个点的边缘法线。这是通过查看X-Sobel和Y-Sobel的符号和相对大小来完成的，将这些点分为4类：水平，垂直，对角线和对角线。然后查看正向和反向，以查看这些方向中任一方向的值是否大于所讨论的点。使用插值法得到混合的点，而不是选择最接近法线的点。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm [1] works by making multiple passes over the image, removing pixels matching a set of criteria designed to thin connected regions while preserving eight-connected components and 2 x 2 squares [2]. In each of the two sub-iterations the algorithm correlates the intermediate skeleton image with a neighborhood mask, then looks up each neighborhood in a lookup table indicating whether the central pixel should be deleted in that sub-iteration.
trans-unit.target: 该算法[1]通过对图像进行多次遍历，除去匹配一组用于缩小连接区域的标准的像素，同时保留八个连接的分量和2 x 2平方[2]来工作。在两个子迭代的每一个中，该算法将中间骨架图像与邻域掩码相关联，然后在查找表中查找每个邻域，以指示是否应在该子迭代中删除中心像素。

trans-unit.source: This class instead assumes that the costs array contains at each position the “cost” of a unit distance of travel through that position. For example, a move (in 2-d) from (1, 1) to (1, 2) is assumed to originate in the center of the pixel (1, 1) and terminate in the center of (1, 2). The entire move is of distance 1, half through (1, 1) and half through (1, 2); thus the cost of that move is (1/2)*costs[1,1] + (1/2)*costs[1,2].
trans-unit.target: 此类则假设费用数组在每个位置包含通过该位置的单位行驶距离的“费用”。例如，假定从（1，1）到（1，2）的（2-d）移动始于像素（1，1）的中心，终止于（1，2）的中心。整个移动的距离为1，一半穿过（1，1），一半穿过（1，2）；因此，此举的成本为 (1/2)*costs[1,1] + (1/2)*costs[1,2] 。

trans-unit.source: This code gives the same precision as the FFT upsampled cross-correlation in a fraction of the computation time and with reduced memory requirements. It obtains an initial estimate of the cross-correlation peak by an FFT and then refines the shift estimation by upsampling the DFT only in a small neighborhood of that estimate by means of a matrix-multiply DFT.
trans-unit.target: 该代码以较少的计算时间和较少的内存需求提供了与FFT上采样交叉相关相同的精度。它通过FFT获得交叉相关峰值的初始估计值,然后通过矩阵乘法DFT,仅在该估计值的小范围内对DFT进行上采样,从而完善位移估计。

trans-unit.source: This function implements a watershed algorithm [1][2] that apportions pixels into marked basins. The algorithm uses a priority queue to hold the pixels with the metric for the priority queue being pixel value, then the time of entry into the queue - this settles ties in favor of the closest marker.
trans-unit.target: 此功能实现了分水岭算法[1] [2]，该算法将像素分配到标记的盆地中。该算法使用优先级队列来保存像素，其中优先级队列的度量标准是像素值，然后输入队列的时间-这样可以使关系更紧密，有利于最接近的标记。

trans-unit.source: This function implements a watershed algorithm [1][2] that apportions pixels into marked basins. The algorithm uses a priority queue to hold the pixels with the metric for the priority queue being pixel value, then the time of entry into the queue - this settles ties in favor of the closest marker. Some ideas taken from Soille, “Automated Basin Delineation from Digital Elevation Models Using Mathematical Morphology”, Signal Processing 20 (1990) 171-182 The most important insight in the paper is that entry time onto the queue solves two problems: a pixel should be assigned to the neighbor with the largest gradient or, if there is no gradient, pixels on a plateau should be split between markers on opposite sides. This implementation converts all arguments to specific, lowest common denominator types, then passes these to a C algorithm. Markers can be determined manually, or automatically using for example the local minima of the gradient of the image, or the local maxima of the distance function to the background for separating overlapping objects (see example).
trans-unit.target: 该函数实现了分水岭算法[1] [2]将像素分配到明显的盆地中。该算法使用优先级队列来保存像素，优先级队列的度量标准是像素值，然后输入队列的时间-这将使关系更紧密，有利于最接近的标记。 Soille的一些想法，“使用数学形态学从数字高程模型自动进行盆地划分”，信号处理20（1990）171-182。本文最重要的见解是，进入队列的时间解决了两个问题：像素应该是分配给具有最大梯度的邻域，如果没有梯度，则应在相对两侧的标记之间分割高原上的像素。此实现将所有参数转换为特定的最低公分母类型，然后将其传递给C算法。标记可以手动确定，或自动使用例如图像梯度的局部最小值，或到背景的距离函数的局部最大值来分离重叠的对象（请参见示例）。

trans-unit.source: This function implements a watershed algorithm [1][2] that apportions pixels into marked basins. The algorithm uses a priority queue to hold the pixels with the metric for the priority queue being pixel value, then the time of entry into the queue - this settles ties in favor of the closest marker.
trans-unit.target: 该功能实现了分水岭算法[1] [2]，该算法将像素分配到标记的盆地中。该算法使用优先级队列来保存像素，优先级队列的度量标准是像素值，然后输入队列的时间-这将使关系更紧密，有利于最接近的标记。

trans-unit.source: This function implements a watershed algorithm [1][2] that apportions pixels into marked basins. The algorithm uses a priority queue to hold the pixels with the metric for the priority queue being pixel value, then the time of entry into the queue - this settles ties in favor of the closest marker.
trans-unit.target: 此功能实现了分水岭算法[1] [2]，该算法将像素分配到标记的盆地中。该算法使用优先级队列来保存像素，其中优先级队列的度量标准是像素值，然后输入队列的时间-这样可以使关系更紧密，有利于最接近的标记。

trans-unit.source: This function is based on scipy.signal.get_window and thus can access all of the window types available to that function (e.g., "hann", "boxcar"). Note that certain window types require parameters that have to be supplied with the window name as a tuple (e.g., ("tukey", 0.8)). If only a float is supplied, it is interpreted as the beta parameter of the Kaiser window.
trans-unit.target: 该函数基于 scipy.signal.get_window ，因此可以访问该函数可用的所有窗口类型（例如 "hann" ， "boxcar" ）。请注意，某些窗口类型要求参数必须随窗口名称一起作为元组提供（例如 ("tukey", 0.8) ）。如果仅提供浮点数，则将其解释为Kaiser窗口的beta参数。

trans-unit.source: This function transforms the input image pixelwise according to the equation O = gain*log(1 + I) after scaling each pixel to the range 0 to 1. For inverse logarithmic correction, the equation is O = gain*(2**I - 1).
trans-unit.target: 此函数在将每个像素缩放到0到1的范围后，根据等式 O = gain*log(1 + I) 按像素对输入图像进行变换。对于逆对数校正，等式为 O = gain*(2**I - 1) 。

trans-unit.source: This function uses skimage.morphology.label to define unique objects, finds the convex hull of each using convex_hull_image, and combines these regions with logical OR. Be aware the convex hulls of unconnected objects may overlap in the result. If this is suspected, consider using convex_hull_image separately on each object or adjust connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 此函数使用 skimage.morphology.label 定义唯一的对象，并使用 convex_hull_image 查找每个对象的凸包，并将这些区域与逻辑或组合。请注意，未连接对象的凸包可能会在结果中重叠。如果怀疑是这种情况，请考虑在每个对象上分别使用凸面影像或调整 connectivity 。

trans-unit.source: This function uses lab2xyz and xyz2rgb. By default Observer= 2A, Illuminant= D65. CIE XYZ tristimulus values x_ref=95.047, y_ref=100., z_ref=108.883. See function get_xyz_coords for a list of supported illuminants.
trans-unit.target: 此函数使用lab2xyz和xyz2rgb。默认情况下，观察者= 2A，光源= D65。CIE XYZ三刺激值x_ref = 95.047，y_ref = 100。，z_ref = 108.883。有关支持的光源的列表，请参见函数 get_xyz_coords 。

trans-unit.target: 此函数使用rgb2xyz和xyz2lab。默认情况下，观察者= 2A，光源= D65。CIE XYZ三刺激值x_ref = 95.047，y_ref = 100。，z_ref = 108.883。有关支持的光源的列表，请参见函数 get_xyz_coords 。

trans-unit.source: This function uses skimage.morphology.label to define unique objects, finds the convex hull of each using convex_hull_image, and combines these regions with logical OR. trans-unit.source: This function uses the Difference of Gaussians method for applying band-pass filters to multi-dimensional arrays. The input array is blurred with two Gaussian kernels of differing sigmas to produce two intermediate, filtered images. The more-blurred image is then subtracted from the less-blurred image. The final output image will therefore have had high-frequency components attenuated by the smaller-sigma Gaussian, and low frequency components will have been removed due to their presence in the more-blurred intermediate.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用高斯差分法对多维数组进行带通滤波。输入的数组用两个不同sigmas的高斯核进行模糊处理,产生两个中间的滤波图像,然后用较模糊的图像减去较不模糊的图像。然后从模糊程度较低的图像中减去模糊程度较高的图像。因此,最终的输出图像将有高频成分被较小西格玛的高斯衰减,而低频成分由于存在于较模糊的中间图像中而被去除。

trans-unit.source: This function will subtract an array filtered with a Gaussian kernel with sigmas given by high_sigma from an array filtered with a Gaussian kernel with sigmas provided by low_sigma. The values for high_sigma must always be greater than or equal to the corresponding values in low_sigma, or a ValueError will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 此功能将减去与高斯内核与由给定的西格玛过滤阵列 high_sigma 从用高斯内核与由提供西格玛过滤阵列 low_sigma 。 high_sigma 的值必须始终大于或等于 low_sigma 中的相应值，否则将引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: This implementation converts all arguments to specific, lowest common denominator types, then passes these to a C algorithm.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the algorithm is somewhat simplified in the sense that the area factor ‘nu’ described in the original paper is not implemented, and is only suitable for grayscale images.
trans-unit.target: 从没有实现原始论文中描述的面积因子“ nu”的意义上来说，该算法的实现有所简化，仅适用于灰度图像。

trans-unit.source: This implementation relies on a Cython function whose complexity is \(O\left(\frac{Ch^{C-1}}{(C-1)!}\right)\), where \(h\) is the number of histogram bins and \(C\) is the number of classes desired.
trans-unit.target: 这个实现依赖于一个Cython函数,它的复杂度是 \(O\left(\frac{Ch^{C-1}}{(C-1)!}right)\),其中 \(h/)是直方图仓的数量,而 \(C/)是所需的类的数量。
