trans-unit.source: This is a version of the Chan-Vese algorithm that uses morphological operators instead of solving a partial differential equation (PDE) for the evolution of the contour. The set of morphological operators used in this algorithm are proved to be infinitesimally equivalent to the Chan-Vese PDE (see [1]). However, morphological operators are do not suffer from the numerical stability issues typically found in PDEs (it is not necessary to find the right time step for the evolution), and are computationally faster.
trans-unit.target: 这是Chan-Vese算法的一种版本，该算法使用形态运算符，而不是求解轮廓演化的偏微分方程（PDE）。事实证明，该算法中使用的形态学算子集在无限程度上等效于Chan-Vese PDE（请参见[1]）。但是，形态算子不会受到PDE中通常存在的数值稳定性问题的困扰（不必为演化找到合适的时间步长），并且运算速度更快。

trans-unit.source: This is a version of the Chan-Vese algorithm that uses morphological operators instead of solving a partial differential equation (PDE) for the evolution of the contour. The set of morphological operators used in this algorithm are proved to be infinitesimally equivalent to the Chan-Vese PDE (see [1]). However, morphological operators are do not suffer from the numerical stability issues typically found in PDEs (it is not necessary to find the right time step for the evolution), and are computationally faster.
trans-unit.target: 这是Chan-Vese算法的一种版本，该算法使用形态运算符，而不是为轮廓的演化求解偏微分方程（PDE）。事实证明，该算法中使用的形态学算子集无限地等同于Chan-Vese PDE（请参见[1]）。但是，形态算子不会受到PDE中通常存在的数值稳定性问题的困扰（不必为进化找到合适的时间步长），并且运算速度更快。

trans-unit.source: This is a version of the Geodesic Active Contours (GAC) algorithm that uses morphological operators instead of solving partial differential equations (PDEs) for the evolution of the contour. The set of morphological operators used in this algorithm are proved to be infinitesimally equivalent to the GAC PDEs (see [1]). However, morphological operators are do not suffer from the numerical stability issues typically found in PDEs (e.g., it is not necessary to find the right time step for the evolution), and are computationally faster.
trans-unit.target: 这是测地线活动轮廓（GAC）算法的一种版本，该算法使用形态学运算符，而不是求解轮廓演化的偏微分方程（PDE）。该算法中使用的形态学算子集被证明与GAC PDEs无限等效（参见[1]）。但是，形态算子不会受到PDE中通常存在的数值稳定性问题的困扰（例如，不必找到正确的演化时间步长），并且运算速度更快。

trans-unit.source: This is a version of the Geodesic Active Contours (GAC) algorithm that uses morphological operators instead of solving partial differential equations (PDEs) for the evolution of the contour. The set of morphological operators used in this algorithm are proved to be infinitesimally equivalent to the GAC PDEs (see [1]). However, morphological operators are do not suffer from the numerical stability issues typically found in PDEs (e.g., it is not necessary to find the right time step for the evolution), and are computationally faster.
trans-unit.target: 这是测地线活动轮廓（GAC）算法的一种版本，该算法使用形态学运算符，而不是为轮廓的演化求解偏微分方程（PDE）。事实证明，该算法中使用的形态学算子集与GAC PDE无限等价（参见[1]）。但是，形态算子不会受到PDE中通常存在的数值稳定性问题的困扰（例如，无需找到正确的演化时间步长），并且运算速度更快。

trans-unit.source: This is an edge-preserving and noise reducing denoising filter. It averages pixels based on their spatial closeness and radiometric similarity.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种边缘保护和降噪去噪滤波器。它根据像素的空间接近度和辐射相似度对其进行平均。

trans-unit.source: This is an edge-preserving, denoising filter. It averages pixels based on their spatial closeness and radiometric similarity [1].
trans-unit.target: 这是一个保留边缘的去噪滤波器。它基于像素的空间接近度和放射线相似度[1]对像素进行平均。

trans-unit.source: This is an edge-preserving, denoising filter. It averages pixels based on their spatial closeness and radiometric similarity [1].
trans-unit.target: 这是一个保留边缘的去噪滤波器。它基于像素的空间接近度和放射线相似度对它们进行平均[1]。

trans-unit.source: This is one of the simplest corner detectors and is comparatively fast but has several limitations (e.g. not rotation invariant).
trans-unit.target: 这是最简单的角检测器之一,速度比较快,但有一些局限性(如不是旋转不变)。

trans-unit.source: This is required when subclassing Graph with networkx v2 and does not cause problems for v1. Here is more detail from the network migrating from 1.x to 2.x document:
trans-unit.target: 这是用networkx v2子类Graph时需要的,不会给v1带来问题。这里是网络从1.x迁移到2.x文档的更多细节。

trans-unit.source: This is the 3D equivalent of a diamond. A pixel is part of the neighborhood (i.e. labeled 1) if the city block/Manhattan distance between it and the center of the neighborhood is no greater than radius.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于一个钻石的3D。如果一个像素与邻域中心之间的城市街区/曼哈顿距离不大于半径,那么它就是邻域的一部分(即标注为1)。

trans-unit.source: This is the 3D equivalent of a disk. A pixel is within the neighborhood if the Euclidean distance between it and the origin is no greater than radius.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于一个磁盘的3D。如果一个像素和原点之间的欧氏距离不大于半径,那么它就在附近。

trans-unit.source: This is the 3D equivalent of a disk. A pixel is within the neighborhood if the euclidean distance between it and the origin is no greater than radius.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于一个磁盘的3D。如果一个像素和原点之间的欧氏距离不大于半径,那么它就在附近。

trans-unit.source: This is the 3D equivalent of a square. Every pixel along the perimeter has a chessboard distance no greater than radius (radius=floor(width/2)) pixels.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于一个正方形的3D。沿着周长的每个像素都有一个不大于半径(半径=floor(width/2))像素的棋盘距离。

trans-unit.source: This is the color space commonly used by video codecs, also called the reversible color transform in JPEG2000.
trans-unit.target: 这是视频编解码器常用的色彩空间,在JPEG2000中也称为可逆色彩变换。

trans-unit.source: This is the color space commonly used by video codecs. It is also the reversible color transform in JPEG2000.
trans-unit.target: 这是视频编解码器常用的颜色空间。它也是JPEG2000中的可逆颜色变换。

trans-unit.source: This is the color space which is commonly used by video codecs, it is also the reversible color transform in JPEG2000.
trans-unit.target: 这是视频编解码器常用的色彩空间,也是JPEG2000中的可逆色彩变换。

trans-unit.source: This is the launch photo of Falcon 9 carrying DSCOVR lifted off from SpaceX’s Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, FL.
trans-unit.target: 这是搭载DSCOVR的猎鹰9号从佛罗里达州卡纳维拉尔角空军基地的SpaceX 40号发射场升空的发射照片。

trans-unit.source: This low-contrast image of the surface of the moon is useful for illustrating histogram equalization and contrast stretching.
trans-unit.target: 这种月球表面的低对比度图像对说明直方图均衡和对比度拉伸很有用。

trans-unit.source: This means that to find reasonable contours, it is best to find contours midway between the expected “light” and “dark” values. In particular, given a binarized array, do not choose to find contours at the low or high value of the array. This will often yield degenerate contours, especially around structures that are a single array element wide. Instead choose a middle value, as above.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着要找到合理的轮廓，最好是在预期的“亮”和“暗”值之间的中间找到轮廓。特别是，对于二进制数组，不要选择在数组的低值或高值处找到轮廓。这通常会产生退化的轮廓，尤其是在单个数组元素宽的结构周围。而是选择一个中间值，如上所述。

trans-unit.source: This method calculates the travel cost for going from the current node to the next. The default implementation returns new_cost. Overload this method to adapt the behaviour of the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法计算从当前节点到下一个节点的旅行成本。默认实现返回new_cost。重载此方法以适应算法的行为。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overloaded to keep track of other arrays that are used by a specific implementation of the algorithm. For instance the MCP_Connect class uses it to update an id map.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以被重载,以跟踪算法的特定实现所使用的其他数组。例如,MCP_Connect类使用它来更新id映射。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overloaded to modify the behavior of the MCP algorithm. An example might be to stop the algorithm when a certain cumulative cost is reached, or when the front is a certain distance away from the seed point.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以被重载来修改MCP算法的行为。例如,当达到一定的累积成本时,或者当前面离种子点有一定距离时,可以停止算法。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overloaded to obtain information about neightboring nodes, and/or to modify the behavior of the MCP algorithm. One example is the MCP_Connect class, which checks for meeting fronts using this hook.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以被重载来获取neightboring节点的信息,和/或修改MCP算法的行为。一个例子是 MCP_Connect 类,它使用这个钩子检查会议前沿。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden or extended in subclasses and plugins to react to image changes.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以在子类和插件中重载或扩展,以对图像变化做出反应。

trans-unit.source: This method finds the minimum-cost path to the specified ending indices from any one of the specified starting indices. If no end positions are given, then the minimum-cost path to every position in the costs array will be found.
trans-unit.target: 本方法从任何一个指定的起始索引中找到通往指定终点索引的最小成本路径。如果没有给出终点位置,那么将找到通往成本数组中每个位置的最小成本路径。

trans-unit.source: This method is called once for every pair of neighboring nodes, as soon as both nodes are frozen.
trans-unit.target: 每一对相邻节点,只要两个节点都被冻结,这个方法就会被调用一次。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a node is updated, right after new_index is pushed onto the heap and the traceback map is updated.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法在更新节点时被调用,就在new_index被推送到堆上,回溯图被更新之后。

trans-unit.source: This method should return 1 if the algorithm should not check the current point’s neighbours and 2 if the algorithm is now done.
trans-unit.target: 如果算法不应该检查当前点的邻居，则此方法应返回1，如果算法现在已完成，则应返回2。

trans-unit.source: This minimizes the sum of shortest (orthogonal) distances from the given data points to the estimated line.
trans-unit.target: 这使给定数据点到估计线的最短(正交)距离之和最小化。

trans-unit.source: This module is primarily intended for teaching and differs significantly from the normal, array-oriented image functions used by scikit-image.
trans-unit.target: 本模块主要用于教学,与scikit-image使用的普通的、面向数组的图像函数有很大区别。

trans-unit.source: This module uses the Cartesian coordinate system, where the origin is at the lower-left corner instead of the upper-right and the order is x, y instead of row, column.
trans-unit.target: 本模块使用笛卡尔坐标系,原点在左下角而不是右上角,顺序是x、y而不是行、列。

trans-unit.source: This operation is known as the h-dome of the image and leaves features of height h in the subtracted image.
trans-unit.target: 此操作被称为图像的h-圆顶，并且在相减后的图像中保留高度为 h 的特征。

trans-unit.source: This parameter allows for the use of reverse or forward order of the image axes in gradient computation. ‘rc’ indicates the use of the first axis initially (Hrr, Hrc, Hcc), whilst ‘xy’ indicates the usage of the last axis initially (Hxx, Hxy, Hyy)
trans-unit.target: 此参数允许在梯度计算中使用图像轴的反向或正向顺序。“ rc”表示最初使用第一个轴（Hrr，Hrc，Hcc），而“ xy”表示最初使用最后一个轴（Hxx，Hxy，Hyy）

trans-unit.source: This parameter allows for the use of reverse or forward order of the image axes in gradient computation. ‘xy’ indicates the usage of the last axis initially (Hxx, Hxy, Hyy), whilst ‘rc’ indicates the use of the first axis initially (Hrr, Hrc, Hcc).
trans-unit.target: 此参数允许在梯度计算中使用图像轴的反向或正向顺序。“ xy”表示最初使用最后一个轴（Hxx，Hxy，Hyy），而“ rc”表示最初使用第一个轴（Hrr，Hrc，Hcc）。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is deprecated and will be removed in version 0.19.0 in favor of in_place. If True, flood filling is applied to image inplace. If False, the flood filled result is returned without modifying the input image (default).
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用此参数，它将在版本0.19.0中删除，以支持in_place。如果为True，则将洪水填充应用于原位 image 。如果为False，则返回泛洪填充结果，而不修改输入 image （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: This photograph contains the Hubble Telescope’s farthest ever view of the universe. It can be useful as an example for multi-scale detection.
trans-unit.target: 这张照片包含哈勃望远镜有史以来最遥远的宇宙视图。它可以用作多尺度检测的示例。

trans-unit.source: This photograph is courtesy of Pikolo Espresso Bar. It contains several elliptical shapes as well as varying texture (smooth porcelain to course wood grain).
trans-unit.target: 此照片由Pikolo Espresso Bar提供。它包含了几个椭圆的形状以及不同的质地(光滑的瓷器到粗糙的木纹)。

trans-unit.source: This photograph of a wall clock was taken while moving the camera in an aproximately horizontal direction. It may be used to illustrate inverse filters and deconvolution.
trans-unit.target: 这张挂钟的照片是在近似水平方向移动相机时拍摄的。它可以用来说明反滤镜和解卷。

trans-unit.source: This picture shows colonic glands where the IHC expression of FHL2 protein is revealed with DAB. Hematoxylin counterstaining is applied to enhance the negative parts of the tissue.
trans-unit.target: 这张图显示了结肠腺体,其中FHL2蛋白的IHC表达是用DAB揭示的。应用苏木精反染来增强组织的阴性部分。

trans-unit.source: This replaces each pixel by the local maximum if the pixel gray value is closer to the local maximum than the local minimum. Otherwise it is replaced by the local minimum.
trans-unit.target: 如果像素灰度值比本地最小值更接近本地最大值,则用本地最大值替换每个像素。否则就会被本地最小值替换。

trans-unit.source: This replaces each pixel by the local maximum if the pixel greyvalue is closer to the local maximum than the local minimum. Otherwise it is replaced by the local minimum.
trans-unit.target: 如果像素的灰度值比本地最小值更接近本地最大值,则用本地最大值替换每个像素。否则就会被本地最小值替换。

trans-unit.source: This routine does not generate SIFT/SURF features from an image. These algorithms are patent encumbered. Please use skimage.feature.CENSURE instead.
trans-unit.target: 此例程不会从图像生成SIFT / SURF特征。这些算法受专利保护。请改用 skimage.feature.CENSURE 。

trans-unit.source: This routine does not generate SIFT/SURF features from an image. These algorithms are patent encumbered. Please use skimage.feature.CENSURE instead.

trans-unit.target: 该例程从http://people.cs.ubc.ca/~lowe/keypoints/和http://www.vision.ee.ethz.ch/~surf/中读取由二进制实用程序生成的SIFT或SURF文件。

trans-unit.source: This should have the same shape as that of labels. For all pixels along the boundary between 2 adjacent regions, the average value of the corresponding pixels in edge_map is the edge weight between them.
trans-unit.target: 它应具有与 labels 相同的形状。对于沿着2个相邻区域之间的边界的所有像素， edge_map 中相应像素的平均值是它们之间的边缘权重。

trans-unit.source: This viewer is a simple container object that holds a Matplotlib axes for showing images. ImageViewer doesn’t subclass the Matplotlib axes (or figure) because of the high probability of name collisions.
trans-unit.target: 该查看器是一个简单的容器对象，其中包含用于显示图像的Matplotlib轴。由于名称冲突的可能性很高，因此 ImageViewer 不会将Matplotlib轴（或图形）作为子类。

trans-unit.source: Threshold for rejecting interest points which have ratio of principal curvatures greater than this value.

trans-unit.source: Threshold image. All pixels in the input image higher than the corresponding pixel in the threshold image are considered foreground.
trans-unit.target: 阈值图像。输入图像中所有高于阈值图像中相应像素的像素都被视为前景。

trans-unit.source: Threshold mask. All pixels with an intensity higher than this value are assumed to be foreground.
trans-unit.target: 阈值掩模。所有强度高于这个值的像素都被认为是前景。

trans-unit.source: Threshold used in deciding whether the pixels on the circle are brighter, darker or similar w.r.t. the test pixel. Decrease the threshold when more corners are desired and vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: 阈值用于决定圆圈上的像素与测试像素之间是亮的、暗的还是相似的。当需要更多的角时,降低阈值,反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Threshold value used to suppress maximas and minimas with a weak magnitude response obtained after Non-Maximal Suppression.
trans-unit.target: 阈值用于抑制非最大抑制后得到的具有弱幅度响应的最大和最小值。

trans-unit.source: Total-variation denoising (also know as total-variation regularization) tries to find an image with less total-variation under the constraint of being similar to the input image, which is controlled by the regularization parameter ([1], [2], [3], [4]).
trans-unit.target: 总变异去噪（也称为总变异正则化）试图在与输入图像相似的约束下找到总变异较小的图像，该图像由正则化参数控制[[1]，[2]，[3]，[4]）。

trans-unit.source: Total-variation denoising (also know as total-variation regularization) tries to find an image with less total-variation under the constraint of being similar to the input image, which is controlled by the regularization parameter ([1], [2], [3], [4]).
trans-unit.target: 总变异去噪（也称为总变异正则化）试图在与输入图像相似的约束下找到总变异较小的图像，该图像由正则化参数控制[[1]，[2]，[3]，[4]）。

trans-unit.source: Trace a minimum cost path through the pre-calculated traceback array.
trans-unit.target: 通过预先计算的回溯数组,追踪一条最小成本的路径。

trans-unit.source: Transformation matrices use Homogeneous coordinates, which are the extension of Cartesian coordinates used in Euclidean geometry to the more general projective geometry. In particular, points at infinity can be represented with finite coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 变换矩阵使用齐次坐标，这是在欧几里得几何中使用的直角坐标到更一般的投影几何的扩展。特别是，无限远处的点可以用有限的坐标表示。

It’s apply only if psf and/or reg are provided as transfer function. For the hermitian property see uft module or np.fft.rfftn.

trans-unit.source: Tutorials
trans-unit.target: Tutorials

trans-unit.source: Two pixels are connected when they are neighbors and have the same value. In 2D, they can be neighbors either in a 1- or 2-connected sense. The value refers to the maximum number of orthogonal hops to consider a pixel/voxel a neighbor:
trans-unit.target: 当两个像素是邻居并且具有相同的值时,它们是相连的。在2D中,它们可以是1-或2-连接意义上的邻居。这个值指的是将一个像素/voxel作为邻居的最大正交跳数。

trans-unit.source: Two-dimensional window design, Wikipedia, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_dimensional_window_design
trans-unit.target: 二维窗口设计，维基百科，https：//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two_Dimension_window_design

trans-unit.source: Type of bi-level filter used to get the scales of the input image. Possible values are ‘DoB’, ‘Octagon’ and ‘STAR’. The three modes represent the shape of the bi-level filters i.e. box(square), octagon and star respectively. For instance, a bi-level octagon filter consists of a smaller inner octagon and a larger outer octagon with the filter weights being uniformly negative in both the inner octagon while uniformly positive in the difference region. Use STAR and Octagon for better features and DoB for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取输入图像比例的双层过滤器的类型。可能的值为“ DoB”，“八角形”和“ STAR”。这三种模式分别代表了双层滤波器的形状，即方框（正方形），八角形和星形。例如，双层八边形滤波器由一个较小的内部八角形和一个较大的外部八角形组成，滤波器的权重在两个内部八角形中均一致为负，而在差异区域中均一致为正。使用STAR和Octagon获得更好的功能，并使用DoB获得更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for lambda1 and lambda2 are 1. If the ‘background’ is very different from the segmented object in terms of distribution (for example, a uniform black image with figures of varying intensity), then these values should be different from each other.
trans-unit.target: 为典型值 lambda1 和 lambda2 是1.如果“背景”是从被分割对象在分布方面非常不同的（例如，具有不同强度的数字均匀的黑色图像），然后将这些值应该是彼此不同的。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for mu are between 0 and 1, though higher values can be used when dealing with shapes with very ill-defined contours.
trans-unit.target: mu的典型值在0和1之间,但在处理轮廓非常不清晰的形状时,可以使用更高的值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike numpy.histogram, this function returns the centers of bins and does not rebin integer arrays. For integer arrays, each integer value has its own bin, which improves speed and intensity-resolution.
trans-unit.target: 与 numpy.histogram 不同，此函数返回bin的中心，并且不重新绑定整数数组。对于整数数组，每个整数值都有其自己的bin，从而提高了速度和强度分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Unlike numpy.histogram, this function returns the centers of bins and does not rebin integer arrays. For integer arrays, each integer value has its own bin, which improves speed and intensity-resolution.
trans-unit.target: 与 numpy.histogram 不同，此函数返回bin的中心，并且不重新绑定整数数组。对于整数数组，每个整数值都有其自己的bin，从而提高了速度和强度分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Unlike pyplot.figimage, this actually plots onto an axes object, which fills the figure. Plotting the image onto an axes allows for subsequent overlays of axes artists.
trans-unit.target: 与 pyplot.figimage 不同的是,它实际上是将图像绘制到一个 axes 对象上,而 axes 对象则填充了图形。将图像绘制到 axes 上,可以进行 axes 艺术家的后续叠加。

trans-unit.source: Unsharp masking
trans-unit.target: 不锋利的遮蔽

trans-unit.source: Unsharp masking filter.
trans-unit.target: 不锋利的遮挡过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Unsharp masking is an image sharpening technique. It is a linear image operation, and numerically stable, unlike deconvolution which is an ill-posed problem. Because of this stability, it is often preferred over deconvolution.
trans-unit.target: 非锐化遮罩是一种图像锐化技术。它是一种线性图像操作,并且在数值上是稳定的,不像解卷是一个不稳定的问题。由于这种稳定性,它通常比解卷积更受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: Unsharp masking is described in most introductory digital image processing books. This implementation is based on [1].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数入门性数字图像处理书籍中都描述了锐化蒙版。此实现基于[1]。

trans-unit.source: We will use these markers in a watershed segmentation. The name watershed comes from an analogy with hydrology. The watershed transform floods an image of elevation starting from markers, in order to determine the catchment basins of these markers. Watershed lines separate these catchment basins, and correspond to the desired segmentation.
trans-unit.target: 我们将在分水岭分割中使用这些标记。分水岭这个名字源于与水文学的类比。该分水岭变换洪水高程的图像从标记开始，以确定这些标记的集水盆地。分水岭线将这些流域盆地分隔开，并与所需的分段相对应。

trans-unit.source: We will use these markers in a watershed segmentation. The name watershed comes from an analogy with hydrology. The watershed transform floods an image of elevation starting from markers, in order to determine the catchment basins of these markers. Watershed lines separate these catchment basins, and correspond to the desired segmentation.
trans-unit.target: 我们将在分水岭分割中使用这些标记。分水岭这个名字源于与水文学的类比。该分水岭变换洪水高程的图像从标记开始，以确定这些标记的集水盆地。分水岭线将这些流域盆地分隔开，并与所需的分段相对应。

trans-unit.source: When high_sigma is none, the values for high_sigma will be calculated as 1.6x the corresponding values in low_sigma. This ratio was originally proposed by Marr and Hildreth (1980) [1] and is commonly used when approximating the inverted Laplacian of Gaussian, which is used in edge and blob detection.
trans-unit.target: 当 high_sigma 是无，对于值 high_sigma 将被计算为1.6×在相应的值 low_sigma 。该比率最初是由Marr和Hildreth（1980）提出的[1]，通常在逼近高斯的倒拉普拉斯算子时使用，该倒数拉普拉斯算子用于边缘和斑点检测。

trans-unit.source: When mode is 'constant', this is the constant used in values outside the boundary of the image data.
trans-unit.target: 当 mode 为 'constant' 时，这是在图像数据边界之外的值中使用的常数。

trans-unit.source: When sigma is provided, a smaller h should typically be used to avoid oversmoothing. The optimal value for h depends on the image content and noise level, but a reasonable starting point is h = 0.8 * sigma when fast_mode is True, or h = 0.6 * sigma when fast_mode is False.
trans-unit.target: 当提供 sigma 时，通常应使用较小的 h 以避免过度平滑。 h 的最佳值取决于图像内容和噪声水平，但是当 fast_mode 为 True 时，合理的起点是 h = 0.8 * sigma ，或者在 fast_mode 为 False 时 h = 0.6 * sigma 。

trans-unit.source: When True (the default), the filter detects black ridges; when False, it detects white ridges.
trans-unit.target: 当为 "真"(默认值)时,过滤器检测黑脊;当为 "假 "时,它检测白脊。

trans-unit.source: When YCbCr conversion is done, every color channel is scaled between 0 and 1, and sigma values are applied to these scaled color channels.
trans-unit.target: 完成YCbCr转换后，每个颜色通道都在0到1之间缩放，并且 sigma 值应用于这些缩放后的颜色通道。

trans-unit.source: When an element of the sequence is True, the unwrapping process will regard the edges along the corresponding axis of the image to be connected and use this connectivity to guide the phase unwrapping process. If only a single boolean is given, it will apply to all axes. Wrap around is not supported for 1D arrays.
trans-unit.target: 当序列的元素为 True 时，展开过程将考虑要连接图像的相应轴上的边缘，并使用此连通性来引导相位展开过程。如果仅给出一个布尔值，它将应用于所有轴。一维阵列不支持环绕。

trans-unit.source: When applying this filter to several color layers independently, color bleeding may occur. More visually pleasing result can be achieved by processing only the brightness/lightness/intensity channel in a suitable color space such as HSV, HSL, YUV, or YCbCr.
trans-unit.target: 当将此滤镜独立应用于多个颜色层时,可能会发生颜色渗漏。通过在合适的色彩空间(如HSV、HSL、YUV或YCbCr)中只处理亮度/明度/强度通道,可以获得更美观的效果。

trans-unit.source: When extracting those features in parallel, be aware that the choice of the backend (i.e. multiprocessing vs threading) will have an impact on the performance. The rule of thumb is as follows: use multiprocessing when extracting features for all possible ROI in an image; use threading when extracting the feature at specific location for a limited number of ROIs. Refer to the example Face classification using Haar-like feature descriptor for more insights.
trans-unit.target: 并行提取这些功能时，请注意，后端的选择（即多处理与线程化）将对性能产生影响。经验法则如下：为图像中所有可能的ROI提取特征时，请使用多处理；在特定位置提取功能以获取有限数量的ROI时，请使用线程。有关更多见解，请参阅使用类似Haar的特征描述符的示例人脸分类。

trans-unit.source: When extracting those features in parallel, be aware that the choice of the backend (i.e. multiprocessing vs threading) will have an impact on the performance. The rule of thumb is as follows: use multiprocessing when extracting features for all possible ROI in an image; use threading when extracting the feature at specific location for a limited number of ROIs. Refer to the example Face classification using Haar-like feature descriptor for more insights.
trans-unit.target: 并行提取这些功能时，请注意，后端的选择（即多处理与线程化）将对性能产生影响。经验法则如下：为图像中所有可能的ROI提取特征时，请使用多处理；在特定位置提取特征以获取有限数量的ROI时，请使用线程。有关更多见解，请参阅使用类似Haar的特征描述符的示例人脸分类。

trans-unit.source: When possible, functions should avoid blindly stretching image intensities (e.g. rescaling a float image so that the min and max intensities are 0 and 1), since this can heavily distort an image. For example, if you’re looking for bright markers in dark images, there may be an image where no markers are present; stretching its input intensity to span the full range would make background noise look like markers.
trans-unit.target: 在可能的情况下，函数应避免盲目拉伸图像强度（例如重新缩放浮动图像，以使最小和最大强度分别为0和1），因为这会严重扭曲图像。例如，如果您要在深色图像中寻找明亮的标记，则可能是图像中没有标记。将其输入强度扩展到整个范围将使背景噪声看起来像标记。

trans-unit.source: When saving a JPEG, the compression ratio may be controlled using the quality keyword argument which is an integer with values in [1, 100] where 1 is worst quality and smallest file size, and 100 is best quality and largest file size (default 75). This is only available when using the PIL and imageio plugins.
trans-unit.target: 保存JPEG时，可以使用 quality 关键字参数控制压缩率，该参数是一个整数，值为[1，100]，其中1是最差质量和最小文件大小，而100是最佳质量和最大文件大小（默认为75） ）。仅在使用PIL和imageio插件时可用。

trans-unit.source: When the Laplacian is decomposed into blocks of marked and unmarked pixels:
trans-unit.target: 当Laplacian被分解成有标记和无标记的像素块时。

trans-unit.source: When the last/rightmost dimension becomes even larger the speedup is even more dramatic. It is worth thinking about data locality when developing algorithms. In particular, scikit-image uses C-contiguous arrays by default. When using nested loops, the last/rightmost dimension of the array should be in the innermost loop of the computation. In the example above, the *= numpy operator iterates over all remaining dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 当最后一个/最右边的尺寸变得更大时，加速会更加剧烈。在开发算法时，值得考虑数据局部性。特别地，默认情况下， scikit-image 使用C连续数组。使用嵌套循环时，数组的最后/最右维度应位于计算的最内部循环中。在上面的示例中， *= numpy运算符遍历所有剩余维。

trans-unit.source: When the last/rightmost dimension becomes even larger, the speedup is even more dramatic. It is worth thinking about data locality when writing algorithms. In particular, know that scikit-image uses C-contiguous arrays unless otherwise specified. When using nested loops, the last/rightmost dimension of the array should be in the innermost loop of the computation. In the example above, the *= numpy operator iterates over all remaining dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 当最后一个/最右边的尺寸变得更大时，加速会更加剧烈。编写算法时值得考虑数据局部性。特别要知道的是，除非另有说明，否则scikit-image使用C连续数组。当使用嵌套循环时，数组的最后/最右维度应在计算的最内部循环中。在上面的示例中， *= numpy运算符遍历所有剩余维。

trans-unit.source: When using SART, a single iteration is usually sufficient to obtain a good reconstruction. Further iterations will tend to enhance high-frequency information, but will also often increase the noise.
trans-unit.target: 当使用SART时,一次迭代通常就足以获得良好的重建。进一步的迭代往往会增强高频信息,但也往往会增加噪声。

trans-unit.source: Where imx and imy are first derivatives, averaged with a gaussian filter. The corner measure is then defined as:
trans-unit.target: 其中imx和imy是第一导数,用高斯滤波器平均。角的测量定义为:

trans-unit.source: Where imx and imy are the first and imxx, imxy, imyy the second derivatives.
trans-unit.target: 其中imx和imy为第一导数,imxx、imxy、imyy为第二导数。

trans-unit.source: Where the ‘*’ patch will be determined by the fill parameter.
trans-unit.target: “ *”补丁的位置将由 fill 参数确定。

trans-unit.source: Whether or not to manipulate the labels array in-place.
trans-unit.target: 是否对标签数组进行就地操作。

trans-unit.source: Whether the generated segments are connected or not
trans-unit.target: 生成的片段是否连接

trans-unit.source: Whether the image is a 3-D array in which the third axis is to be interpreted as multiple channels. If set to False (default), only 2-D arrays are accepted.
trans-unit.target: 图像是否为将第三个轴解释为多个通道的3-D阵列。如果设置为 False （默认），则仅接受二维数组。

trans-unit.source: Whether the input should be converted to Lab colorspace prior to segmentation. For this purpose, the input is assumed to be RGB.
trans-unit.target: 输入是否应在分割前转换为Lab色彩空间。为此,假设输入为RGB。

trans-unit.source: Whether the input should be converted to Lab colorspace prior to segmentation. The input image must be RGB. Highly recommended. This option defaults to True when multichannel=Trueandimage.shape[-1] == 3.
trans-unit.target: 分割之前是否应将输入转换为Lab色彩空间。输入图像必须是RGB。强烈推荐。当 multichannel=True 和 image.shape[-1] == 3 时，此选项默认为 True 。

trans-unit.source: Whether the last axis of the image is to be interpreted as multiple channels or another spatial dimension.
trans-unit.target: 图像的最后一轴是否要解释为多通道或其他空间维度。

trans-unit.source: Whether the last axis of the image is to be interpreted as multiple channels or another spatial dimension. By default, is set to True for 3D (2D+color) inputs, and False for others. Starting in release 0.16, this will always default to False.
trans-unit.target: 图像的最后一个轴是否被解释为多通道或其他空间维度。默认情况下,对于 3D (2D+color)输入设置为 True,对于其他输入设置为 False。从0.16版本开始,它将始终默认为False。

trans-unit.source: Whether the last axis of the image is to be interpreted as multiple channels or another spatial dimension. Set to False for 3-D images.
trans-unit.target: 图像的最后一个轴是要解释为多个通道还是另一个空间尺寸。将3-D图像设置为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Whether the last axis of the image is to be interpreted as multiple channels. A value of False, for a 3D image, is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 图像的最后一个轴是否被解释为多通道。对于3D图像,目前不支持False值。

trans-unit.source: Whether the last axis of the image is to be interpreted as multiple channels. If True, each channel is filtered separately (channels are not mixed together).
trans-unit.target: 图像的最后一个轴是否要被解释为多个通道。如果为True,则每个通道都被单独过滤(通道不会混合在一起)。

trans-unit.source: Whether the last axis of the image is to be interpreted as multiple channels. If True, each channel is filtered separately (channels are not mixed together). Only 3 channels are supported. If None, the function will attempt to guess this, and raise a warning if ambiguous, when the array has shape (M, N, 3).
trans-unit.target: 图像的最后一个轴是否将被解释为多个通道。如果为True，则将分别过滤每个通道（通道不会混合在一起）。仅支持3个通道。如果为 None ，则该函数将尝试猜测这一点，并在数组具有形状（M，N，3）时发出含糊不清的警告。

trans-unit.source: Whether to allow degenerate (i.e. zero-area) triangles in the end-result. Default True. If False, degenerate triangles are removed, at the cost of making the algorithm slower.
trans-unit.target: 是否允许在最终结果中出现退化(即零区域)三角形。默认为True,如果为False,则删除退化三角形,但代价是使算法更慢。如果为False,则删除退化三角形,但代价是使算法更慢。

trans-unit.source: Whether to apply a Gaussian filter to smooth the image prior to down-scaling. It is crucial to filter when down-sampling the image to avoid aliasing artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 是否应用高斯滤波器来平滑图像的下采样前。在对图像进行向下采样时,过滤以避免产生别扭伪影是至关重要的。

trans-unit.source: Whether to apply a Gaussian filter to smooth the image prior to down-scaling. It is crucial to filter when down-sampling the image to avoid aliasing artifacts. If input image data type is bool, no anti-aliasing is applied.
trans-unit.target: 是否应用高斯滤波器来平滑图像的下采样前。在对图像进行向下采样时,过滤以避免出现锯齿伪影是非常重要的,如果输入图像的数据类型为ool,则不应用抗锯齿。如果输入图像数据类型为bool,则不应用抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: Whether to approximate the self-supervised loss used to evaluate the denoiser by only computing it on one masked version of the image. If False, the runtime will be a factor of stride**image.ndim longer.
trans-unit.target: 是否仅通过在图像的一个蒙版上进行计算来估计用于评估降噪器的自我监督损失。如果为False，则运行时间将是 stride**image.ndim 更长的时间。

trans-unit.source: Whether to clip the output to the range of values of the input image. This is enabled by default, since higher order interpolation may produce values outside the given input range.
trans-unit.target: 是否将输出剪辑到输入图像的数值范围。由于高阶插值可能会产生给定输入范围之外的值,因此默认为启用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to clip the perimeter to the provided shape. If this is set to True, the drawn figure will always be a closed polygon with all edges visible.
trans-unit.target: 是否将周长剪切到所提供的形状上。如果设置为True,则绘制的图形将始终是一个封闭的多边形,所有边缘都是可见的。

trans-unit.source: Whether to clip the polygon to the provided shape. If this is set to True, the drawn figure will always be a closed polygon with all edges visible.
trans-unit.target: 是否将多边形剪裁成所提供的形状。如果设置为True,则绘制的图形将始终是一个封闭的多边形,所有边缘都是可见的。

trans-unit.source: Whether to conserve memory by only caching a single frame. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: 是否只缓存一个帧来节省内存。默认为True。

trans-unit.source: Whether to convert the image to grayscale.
trans-unit.target: 是否将图像转换为灰度。

trans-unit.source: Whether to include the endpoint in the returned line. Defaults to False, which allows for easy drawing of multi-point paths.
trans-unit.target: 是否将端点包含在返回的行中,默认为False,便于绘制多点路径。默认为False,这样可以方便绘制多点路径。

trans-unit.source: Whether to keep the original range of values. Otherwise, the input image is converted according to the conventions of img_as_float.
trans-unit.target: 是否保留原始值范围。否则，将根据 img_as_float 的约定转换输入图像。

trans-unit.source: Whether to keep the original range of values. Otherwise, the input image is converted according to the conventions of img_as_float. Also see https://scikit-image.org/docs/dev/user_guide/data_types.html
trans-unit.target: 是否保留原始值范围。否则，将根据 img_as_float 的约定转换输入图像。另请参阅https://scikit-image.org/docs/dev/user_guide/data_types.html

trans-unit.source: Whether to only plot matches and not plot the keypoint locations.
trans-unit.target: 是否只绘制火柴,不绘制关键点位置。

trans-unit.source: Whether to prefilter the estimated optical flow before each image warp. This helps to remove the potential outliers.
trans-unit.target: 是否在每次图像扭曲前对估计的光流进行预过滤。这有助于去除潜在的异常值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to rescale the intensity of each image to [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 是否将每个图像的强度重新调整为[0,1]。

trans-unit.source: Whether to return the full segmentation hierarchy tree and distances.
trans-unit.target: 是否返回完整的分割层次树和距离。

trans-unit.source: Whether to return the number of assigned labels.
trans-unit.target: 是否返回分配的标签数量。

trans-unit.source: Whether to round the coordinates to integer. If True (default), the returned coordinates can be used to directly index into an array. False could be used for e.g. vector drawing.
trans-unit.target: 是否将坐标四舍五入为整数。如果为True（默认），则返回的坐标可用于直接索引到数组中。 False 可以用于例如矢量绘图。

trans-unit.source: Whether to show images side by side, 'horizontal', or one above the other, 'vertical'.
trans-unit.target: 是并行显示图像，还是 'horizontal' 显示图像，还是 'vertical' 显示图像。

trans-unit.source: Whether to treat the final axis as channels (no cycle shifts are performed over the channels axis).
trans-unit.target: 是否将最终轴视为通道(在通道轴上不进行循环移动)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use 4 or 8 adjacent pixels as neighbors. If None, set to 8. Deprecated, useconnectivityinstead.
trans-unit.target: 是使用4个相邻像素还是8个相邻像素。如果将 None 设置为8，则不建议使用 connectivity 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use 4- or 8-“connectivity”. In 3D, 4-“connectivity” means connected pixels have to share face, whereas with 8-“connectivity”, they have to share only edge or vertex. Deprecated, use ``connectivity`` instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用4或8“连接性”。在3D中，4-“连通性”意味着相连的像素必须共享面，而对于8-“连通性”，它们必须仅共享边缘或顶点。不推荐使用，而是使用“ connectivity”。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use 4- or 8-“connectivity”. In 3D, 4-“connectivity” means connected pixels have to share face, whereas with 8-“connectivity”, they have to share only edge or vertex. Deprecated, useconnectivityinstead.
trans-unit.target: 使用4或8“连接性”。在3D中，4-“连通性”意味着相连的像素必须共享面，而对于8-“连通性”，它们必须仅共享边缘或顶点。不推荐使用，请改用 connectivity 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use 4- or 8-connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 是使用4联机还是8联机。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use rc or xy coordinates. The ‘xy’ option (current default) will be removed in version 0.18.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用rc或xy坐标。版本0.18中将删除“ xy”选项（当前默认设置）。

trans-unit.source: Which Minkowski p-norm to use. Should be in the range [1, inf]. A finite large p may cause a ValueError if overflow can occur. inf corresponds to the Chebyshev distance and 2 to the Euclidean distance.
trans-unit.target: 使用哪个Minkowski p范数。应该在[1，inf]范围内。如果可能发生溢出，则有限的大p可能会导致ValueError。 inf 对应于切比雪夫距离，而2对应于欧几里得距离。

trans-unit.source: Which algorithm to use. Zhang’s algorithm [Zha84] only works for 2D images, and is the default for 2D. Lee’s algorithm [Lee94] works for 2D or 3D images and is the default for 3D.
trans-unit.target: 使用哪种算法。Zhang的算法[Zha84]仅适用于2D图像，并且是2D的默认算法。Lee的算法[Lee94]适用于2D或3D图像，并且是3D的默认算法。

trans-unit.source: Which label to consider background (this is only useful for modes inner and outer).
trans-unit.target: 要考虑背景的标签（仅对模式 inner 和 outer 有用）。

trans-unit.target: 绘图中的选线小工具。

trans-unit.target: 情节之上的绘画小工具。

trans-unit.source: Widget for selecting a rectangular region in a plot.
trans-unit.target: 用于选择图中矩形区域的小工具。

trans-unit.source: Width of Gaussian kernel used in preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 预处理中使用的高斯核的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Width of Gaussian kernel used in smoothing the sample density. Higher means fewer clusters.

trans-unit.source: Width of Gaussian smoothing kernel for pre-processing for each dimension of the image. The same sigma is applied to each dimension in case of a scalar value. Zero means no smoothing. Note, that sigma is automatically scaled if it is scalar and a manual voxel spacing is provided (see Notes section).
trans-unit.target: 用于图像每个维度的预处理的高斯平滑核的宽度。如果是标量值，则将相同的sigma应用于每个维。零表示不进行平滑处理。请注意，如果 sigma 为标量并且提供了手动体素间距，则会自动对其进行缩放（请参阅“注释”部分）。

trans-unit.source: Window types: - boxcar - triang - blackman - hamming - hann - bartlett - flattop - parzen - bohman - blackmanharris - nuttall - barthann - kaiser (needs beta) - gaussian (needs standard deviation) - general_gaussian (needs power, width) - slepian (needs width) - dpss (needs normalized half-bandwidth) - chebwin (needs attenuation) - exponential (needs decay scale) - tukey (needs taper fraction)

trans-unit.source: With this method, the result is satisfying for all coins. Even if the markers for the background were not well distributed, the barriers in the elevation map were high enough for these markers to flood the entire background.

trans-unit.target: 使用YCbCr代替YUV作为视频编解码器常用的颜色空间(Y的范围是16到235)。

trans-unit.source: Y is between 16 and 235. This is the color space commonly used by video codecs; it is sometimes incorrectly called “YUV”.
